src: Haa! Boqor Tutankhamun, oo mararka qaar loo yaqaanay “Boqor Tut” ama “ Wiilkii Boqorka ahaa” waa mid ka mid ah boqorada ugu caansana boqoradii Masaarida xilligan casriga ah. Xiiso leh, looma tix gelin inuu aad muhiim u yahay xiliga waqtiqa badan laga joogo sidoo kale laguma diwaan gelin liiska boqorka waqtiga la soo dhafay. Hase ahaatee, helistii la helay qabrigiisa 1922 ayaa caan ka dhigtay. In kastoo qabriyo badan horey loo boobay, qabrigan waxa laga tagay isagoon la taaban. Badiyaa shayyada lagu aasay Tutankhamun ayaa si fiican loo dabolay, waxaana ku jiray kumanaan cadaymod oo laga keenay birihii hore iyo sidoo kale dhagxaantii.
mt: 1. Yes! King Tutankhamun, also known as “King Tut” or “The Boy King,” was one of the most important kings of ancient Egypt. 2. However, his tomb was not discovered until 1922. 3. His mummy was found in a well-preserved state, along with two coffins and a death mask. 4. The discovery of his tomb sparked a worldwide fascination with ancient Egypt and its culture.
ref: "Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as ""King Tut"" or ""The Boy King"", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times. Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists. However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed. Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones."

src: Waxanu naqaana siyaasiyiin badan oo ka soo jeeda Greek, sayni yahaano iyo farshaxano. Qof ka loogu aqoon badan yahay dhan ka dhaqanka waa Homer, waana halyeeyga gabayada kaas oo isu keena aqoonta Greek ga: gabayadiisa Iliad iyo Odyssey. Sophocles iyo Aristophanes waxay weli yihiin riwaayad sameeyayaal caan ah riwaayadahoodana waxa loo aqoonsan yahay inay yihiin kuwa ugu fiican sugaanta caalamka. Nin kale oo caan ah oo Giriig ahi waa Xisaabiya Baytogaraas, kaaso si wayn loogu yaaano aragtidiisii caanka ahayd ee xiriirka ka dhexaysiin jirtay dhinacyada saddex xagalka.
mt: 1. Many Greek politicians were present. 2. One famous Greek is Homer, who wrote the epic poems Iliad and Odyssey. 3. Sophocles and Aristophanes are famous for their plays, which are considered the best in the world. 4. Another famous Greek is Pythagoras, who is known for his mathematical discoveries.
ref: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey. Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature. Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.

src: Greenland ayaa dad yar degenaa, taariikhda waqooyiga ayaa lagu sheegaa in Erik the Red laga masaafuriyay Iceland dilka awgeed, safartiisa galbeedka ayuuna ku aasaasay Greenland, ka dib na Greenland ugu magacaabay. Laakin markaan loo fiirin helidiisa, qabiilooyinka Eskimo halkaas ayay marka horeba ku noolayeen. Inkastoo waddan walba uu ahaa 'iskandaneefiyaan',waxaa jiray farqiyo badan oo u dhaxeeya dadka,boqorada, goobaha hubinta iyo taariikhda Dermak, Iswidhan, Norway iyo Iceland.
mt: 1,000 years ago, Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland and founded Greenland, which was later renamed. However, the Eskimo people had already been living there. All countries were "island nations", with a variety of people, kings, and history between Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
ref: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland. But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time. Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.

src: Iyadoo cuntadooda inteeda badan aynu aqoon doono, Roomaaniyiintu waxay doorkooda ku lahaayeen cuntooyinka qariibka ah, sida butida keymaha, daa’uuska, carsaanyada, iyo nooc jiirarka ka mid ah oo la yidhaahdo daarmoos. Kala duwanaansho kale ayaa ahaa in fuqarada iyo dumarku cuntadooda cuneen iyagoo ku fadhiya kuraasi, halka ragii qaniga ahaa door bideen inay casho fiican wada qaataan iyagoo dhinac-dhinac u jiifa. Cunnadii Romaniyiintii hore laguma soo darin cuntooyinka kusoo biiray yurub kana imaaday Maraykanka amma Aasiyaqarniyadii u danbeeyay. Tusaale ahaan, maysan haysanin hadhuudh, yaanyo, baradho, amase kookaha, qof Romankii hore ahna weligiis ma dhadhamin turkey.

ref: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals. Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries. For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.

src: Ilbaxnimadu waa dhaqan keliya oo ay wadaagaan dad badan oo si wada jir ah u wada nool una wada shaqeeya, bulsho. Ereyga ilbaxnimada wuxuu ka soo jeeda erayga Latiniga ah ee sifilis micnahiisuna waa shacab, kaas oo la xiriiro Latiniga sifis, micnahiisuna yahay muwadin, iyo sifitas, micnahiisuna waa magalo ama maamul-magalo, taas oo sidoo kale marmarka qaar loo qeexo xajmiga bulshada. Maamulada-Magaaloyin ayaa horjeege qaramada. Dhaqan ilbaxnimo ayaa ah aqoonta ay isku dhaafan jiilal kala duwan, dood cadaalada iyo dhaqan dhidibada u aasano sahal ku harin. Dhaqamada yar yar badana way dhumaan ayagoo aan ka tagin wax tariikh cadeen la xirirta hadhowna waa la aqoonsan waayaa inay tahay sida ilbaxnimo sax ah.

ref: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society. The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society. City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination. Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.

src: Drukgyal Dzong waa difaac bur buray, mowlaca budiiska ee qeybaha kore ee dagmada Paro (xaafadda Phondey). Waxa la sheegaa in 1649 kii, uu Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel uu sameeyay qalcadda si uu ugu xuso guushii u ka guulaystay xoogagii Tibetan-Mongol. 1951 kii, ayaa dab waxooga asaartii Drukgyal Dzong ah oo qura soo reebay, sawirkaas oo kale ayuu lahaa Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel. Dabka ka dib, qalcadda waa la ilaaliyay oo la daryeelay, waxaanay noqotay meelaha dalxiiska ee ugu fiican Bhutan.
mt: 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel built the Drukgyal Dzong fortress to protect the Paro Valley (Phondey). In 1951, the Drukgyal Dzong was destroyed by a fire, leaving only a picture of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel. The fortress was later rebuilt and became one of the most important historical sites in Bhutan.
ref: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village). It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces. In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal. After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.

src: Intii lagu jiray qarnigii 18aad ayay Kamboodiya is aragtay iyadoo dhexda ugu jirta laba deris oo awood badan, Taylaan iyo Fiitnaam. Thais wuxuu weeraray Cambodia dhawr jeer intii lagu jiray qarnigii 18aad iyo 1772 waxay burburiyeen Phnom Phen. Sanadkii ugu danbeye ee qarnigii 18aad Vietnamese-ka waxa ay galeen Cambodia.
mt: 18th century Cambodia was at the height of its power, with a strong army, and was a rival to Thailand and Burma. In the 18th century, Thailand invaded Cambodia twice, and in 1772, they burned Phnom Penh. In the late 18th century, Vietnam invaded Cambodia.
ref: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam. The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen. In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.

src: Intii lagu jiray qarnigii 18aad ayay Kamboodiya is aragtay iyadoo dhexda ugu jirta laba deris oo awood badan, Taylaan iyo Fiitnaam. src: Bilowgii qarnigii 15-aad Taiwan waxay badmaaxiin reer Yurub ah u gudbeen iyagoo diiwaan geliyay jasiiradda magaca Ilha Formosa, ama jasiiradda qurux badan. 1624, Shirkada Dutch ee Bariga India waxay aasastay Xarun Kutaala Konfurta galbeed ee Taiwan, Iyada oo kujirto isbadal kusabsan dhaqamada soo sarida hadhuudhka iyo shaqaaleysinta shaqaalaha shiinaha si ay uga shaqeeyaan bariiskeda iyo sonkorta. 1683 dii, ciidamada boqortooyadii Qing (1644-1912) waxay qabsadeen waqooyiga Taywaan iyo aagaga xeebaha waqooyi waxaanu ugu dhawaaqay Taywaan gobol ka tirsan Boqortooyada Ingiriiska ee Boqortooyada Qing ee 1885. Sanaddii 1895tii, kadib guurdaradii Dagaalki koowaad ee shiinaha iyo Jabaaniiska, xukuumadda Qing waxay saxiixday heshiiska Shimonoseki ee madaxbanaanida Taiwan loogu wareejinayay Jabaan, taa oo xukumaysay jasiiradda illaa 1945.
mt: 15th century Taiwan was inhabited by aboriginal peoples, whom the Portuguese called Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island. In 1624, the Dutch East India Company established a settlement in southern Taiwan, where they engaged in sugar production and slave labor. In 1683, the Qing dynasty (1644-1912) conquered northern Taiwan and the eastern coastal areas, and Taiwan became a province of the Qing Empire in 1885. In 1895, after the First Sino-Japanese War, the Qing government signed the Treaty of Shimonoseki, ceding Taiwan to Japan, which ruled Taiwan until 1945.
ref: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island. In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations. In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885. In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.

Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.

src: Marka koox yar oo noola yaala (bulsho yar) ay ka go'aan inta badan bulshadee ka imaden oo ka timid (sida hadii ay ka gudbeyn buuro ama wabiyo ama hadii ay u guureyn jasiirad cusub si fududna ayna dib ugu laaban karin) waxa inta badan galayaan deegan ka duwan midii ay hore u garan jireen. Deegaankani cusub wuxuu leeyahay ilo kala duwan iyo tartameyaal kala gedisan, sidaa awgeed tiradad cidda kunooli waxay u baahan doontaa muuqaalo kala duwan amma la qabsiyo si ay u noqdaan tartameyaal ka xoogan wixii ay hore ugu baahnaayeen. Tirada dadkee hore gebi ahaanba isma beddelin, waxay weli u baahan yihiin la qabsashadii hore oo kale. Mudo ka dib, inta tirada cusub ay bilaabayso inay la qabsato bay’adda, waxay ka sii duwanaanayaan tiradii kale. Ugu danbayntii, kumanaan ama xitaa malaayiin sannadood ka dib, labada nooc aad bay u kala duwanaanayaan ilaa heer aan isku bah lagu tilmaami karinba. Habkan waxaan u naqaan meesiyayn, taasoo la macno samaysanka meesiyada. Meesiyayntu waa natiijo aan la gafi karin waana qayb muhiima oo isged geddiga ka mid ah.

ref: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before. This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before. The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before. Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population. Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species. We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.

src: Bayltonoloojiyiin ayaa maanta rumaysan in koox dhaynasooro ah ay badbaadeen oo weli nool yihiin. Waxaynu u naqaanaa shimbiro. Badana dadku kama fikiraan xaywanka danasoorka maxaa yeelay waxay leyahiin balal ay ku duuli karaan. Balse waxa jira meelo badan oo illaa hadda shimburuhu dhaynasoorada uga eeg yihiin. Waxay leeyihiin lugo maraaro iyo ciddiyo leh, waxay dhalaan ugxaan, waxaanay labadooda lugood ee danbe ugu socdaan sida T-Rex.
mt: 2 days ago, a group of dinosaurs attacked a city. We are now evacuating. The people don't understand the danger they are in. But there are many other cities that are still under attack. They are very dangerous, they are eating people, the last two cities they attacked were T-Rex.
ref: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds. Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly. But there are a lot of things about birds that still look like a dinosaur. They have feet with scales and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on their two back legs like a T-Rex.

ref: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots. Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous. These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves. A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk. Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.

src: Kooxda kubbadda cagta qaran Talyaaniga oo ay la jiraan xulka kubadda cagta ee Jarmalka ayaa ah kooxda labaad ee guusha badan adduuna waxaanay ahaayeen kooxdii ku guuleysatay Koobkii Adduunka ee FIFA 2006 dii. Ciyaaraha caanka ah waxaa ka mid ah kubbadda cagta, kubbadda koleyga, kubbadda laliska, kubadda biyaha, xayndaabka, rugby, baaskiil wadista, xeegada barafka, xeegada duubista iyo tartanka mootada F1 Ciyaarha xagaaga ahaa ah kuwa ugu caansan gobolada waqooyiga, munasabadaha uu ciyaaraha caalamiga ah talyaanigu badiya ahaa ah kuwa olombobikada.
mt: 2006 FIFA World Cup champions Italy are a football team, a rugby team, a basketball team, a water polo team, a volleyball team, a handball team, a hockey team, a field hockey team, and a Formula One racing team. The most popular sports in northern Italy are the international competitions.
ref: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006. Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing. Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.

src: Luxembourg wuxuu leeyahay taarikh dheer laakin xoriyadeedu waxay ku beegantahay 1839. Qaybaha ku cusub Biljamka ayaa ahaa qayb kamida Luxembourg berigii hore lakiin waxay noqdeen Biljam intii ka danbaysay 1830 maadkii kadib kacdoonkii Biljamka. Luxembourg waxay had iyo jeer isku dayi jirtay inay dal dhexdhexaada noqoto balse Dagaaladii Aduunka ee I iyo II waxa qabsaday Jarmalka. 1957 dii ayay Luxembourg noqotay xubintii aasaastay ururka maanta loo yaqaano Midowga Yurub.
mt: 1839 is the year Luxembourg was founded, but the country is part of the modern day Belgium. Luxembourg was part of the Belgium until the 1830 Belgian Revolution. Luxembourg was occupied by Germany during both World Wars. In 1957, Luxembourg became a founding member of the modern day European Union.
ref: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839. Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution. Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany. In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.

src: Dhanka Yurub ee Turki (Bariga Thrace ama Rumelia ee jasiiradda Balkan) ayaa ka qayb ah boqolkiiba 3% ee wadanka. Dhulka Turkigu waxa uu dhererkiisu ka badan yahay 1,600 kilomitir (1,000 mi) ballaciisuna 800 km (500 mi), kaasoo ku dhawaad leh qaab laydi. Cabirka turkiga, marka lagu daro lagaha, waxuu ku fadhiya 783,562 iskuweer kiilomitir (300,948 sq mi), intaaso 755,688 iskuweer kiilomitir (291, 773 sq mi) ay ku jirto koonfur galbeed Asia iyo 23,764 iskuweer kiilomitir (9, 174 sq mi) ay ku jirto Yurub Goobaha Turkey waxay sameyeynayaan aduunka 37 aad inta ugu badan wadanka waana cabirka Metropolitan France iyo United Kingdom la isu keenay. Turkey waxaa ku wareegsan bado saddexda dhinacba: Bada Aegean dhanka galbeedka, Bada Madow dhanka waqooyi iyo Bada Dhexe ee dhanka konfurta.
mt: 3% of the population of Turkey is of European descent. The Turkish peninsula is larger than 1,600 km (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, and is bordered by the Black Sea to the north, the Mediterranean Sea to the south, and the Aegean Sea to the west. The total area of Turkey, including lakes, is 783,562 km² (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 km² (291,773 sq mi) are in Asia and 23,764 km² (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. Turkey is the 37th largest country in the world, after France and the United Kingdom. Turkey is bordered by eight countries: Bulgaria, Georgia, Greece, Iran, Iraq, Armenia, Azerbaijan and Syria. The country is divided into three parts: the Anatolian peninsula to the east, the Black Sea coast to the north, and the Balkan region to the west.
ref: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country. The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape. Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined. Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

src: Tirada dadka Magaalada Faatigaan waa ilaa 800. Waa waddanka ugu yare e xorta ah isla markaana ugu dadka yar adduunka. Magaalada Vatican waxa ay u isticmaasha luuqada Talyaniga sharcigeeda iyo wada hadalka rasmiga. Talyaanigu sidoo kale waa luuqada sida maalin laha ah ay u isticmaalaan badiyaa inta ka shaqaysa maamulka halka latinka badiyaa laga isticmaalo xafladaha diiniga ah. Dhammaan Muwaadiniinta Magaalada Vatican waa Katoolig Roman.
mt: 800 people live in the city. It is the smallest country in the world and the youngest in the world. The Vatican City uses the Italian language for its official and diplomatic purposes. Italian is also the language used daily by the government of the city. All the inhabitants of the Vatican City are Roman Catholics. The Vatican City is the smallest country in the world.
ref: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population. Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications. Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies. All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.

mt: 3D graphics are used to render images and animations. Movies are played using a software player. Music is played using a software player.
ref: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos. Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films. Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.

src: Ku dhawaad guri kasta oo ku yaal magaalooyinka Harappa iyo Mohenjo-daro wuxu leeyahay musqulo la falaashiyo oo ku sii xiran bullaacado casri ah. Nidaamyo boosoneero oo qadiimi ayaa laga helay guriyaha magaalooyinka Minoa oo Crete iyo Santorini ee Greece. Sidoo kale waxaa jiray suuliyaal ay lahaayeen masaaridii hore, Bershiya iyo Jayne. Ilbaxnimadii romaaniya, suuliyada marmarka qaar waxay kamid ahaayeen guryaha dadweynu ku qubaystaan kuwaasi oo kala lahaa rag iyo dumar kuwasi oo ay maamulan shirkadu isku qasani.
mt: 1. Each house in the cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a well for water. 2. The Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini had drainage systems. 3. The ancient cities of Jericho and Jerusalem had wells. 4. The ancient cities of Rome and Athens had sewers. 5. The ancient cities of Babylon and Nineveh had sewers. 6. The ancient cities of Babylon and Nineveh had wells.
ref: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system. Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece. There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.

src: Kabaha loogu talagalay in lagu ciyaaro ciyaaraha barafka waxay leeyahiin laba af waxna wuu u dhaxeeya. Labada af waxay u ogolaanayaan in uu qofku dhulka barafka ah si fican ugu qabto lugahiisa,xitaa qof ka marka uu dhici rabo. Maadaama gunta safeexaddu xoogaa xoodan tahay, mar hadii safeexaddu dhinac u yara janjeedho, dhinacyada barafka taabanaya sidoo kale way xoodmaan. Tani ayaa u keensan karto inuu iskeytka wareegto, hadday iskeytka u wareegtaan midig, qofka ayaa midig u bixi, haday iskeytka u wareegtaan bidax, qofka ayaa bidax u wareegi.
mt: 2 languages are spoken in the airport. The first language is used to tell the passenger to take his/her luggage. The second language is used to tell the passenger to take his/her luggage and leave the airport. The safe exit is very important. If the safe exit is not used, the airport will be closed. This is very important. If the safe exit is used, the passenger will be fined. If the safe exit is not used, the passenger will be fined.
ref: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted. Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves. This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.

src: "Si ay ugu noqdaan heerki tamarta hore, waa in ay iska saaran tamarta cusub ay ka heleen leerka. Waxay sameeyaan tani iyo ku qabanaya iftiinka walax yar oo lagu magacaabo ""footoon"". Saynis yahanadu nidaamkan waxay u yaqaanaan “nidaamka isdhex galka u soo saaro fotanka” sababto ah atamka wuxuu ku sameysma iftiinka, uu sababay nidaamka iftiinka fotanka iyo iftiinka noocisa yahay shucaca. ref: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons. Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy. Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.

src: Markaad wacdo qof kumanaan mayl kuu jira, waxaad isticmaalaysaa dayax-gacmeed. Satalaytka kujira hawada ayaa wicitaanka ka helay u sheegay iuu dib usoo laabto, gadaal isla markiiba. Satalayd ayaa hawada loogu diray dayax gacmeed. Saynisyahanadu waxay isticmaalaan teleskoobyo hawada yaala sababtoo ah hawada dhulku waxay joojisaa qayb kamida iftiinkeena iyo arageenaba. Waxa ay qaadaneysa gataal cabirkiisu yahay 100 fiit jooga in saterleyd ama talescope hada la geeyo.
mt: 1. If you are within 1 mile of the crash site, you should use binoculars. The crash site is visible from the road. Binoculars are used to see distant objects. They are used to see part of the crash site and the wreckage. The binoculars are 100 feet away from the crash site.
ref: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite. The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly. The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view. It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.

src: Waqtiga ayaa ah wax nagu wareegsan, oo na saameeyo wax walbo aanu samayno, laakin haddana adag in la fahmo. Waqtiga waxaa lagu daraseyey si diini, falsafad iyo culimo saynis ah kumanan sano. Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events. You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.

src: Dhaqan ahaan, dhaxal sugah kursigu waxa si toos ah u aadaya milatariga ka dib markuu dhammaysto dugsiga. Si kasto ay ahaato, Charles wuxuu tagay jamacada Trinity College, Cambridge halkaas uu ka soo bartay barashada bini’adamka iyo dhaqan kooda marka dambena wuxu bartay tariikhda isago heley 2:2 (heerka hoose ee fasalka heerka kuwaaad) Charles waxa uu ahaa xubinkii ugu horeeyay ee qoyska Boqortooyada Ingiriiska ka mid ah ee la siiyo shahaado jaamacadeed.
mt: 2:2 (lower second class) Charles was the first member of the British royal family to receive a university degree. He attended Trinity College, Cambridge, where he studied history and politics. He graduated in 1924.
ref: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.

src: Engiriiska ayaa helay waqti dheer oo nabad marka uu Danelaw dib u qabsaday. Si kasta ha ahaatee 991 kii Ethelred wuxuu wajahay caqabadii ugu weyned tan iyo horaanta qarnigii Guthrum. Hurintan waxaa hogaaminayay Olaf Trygvasson, oo ahaa Noorwiijiyaan doonayay inuu waddankiisa dib uga soo qabsado Dhaanishka Ka dib caqabadihii milatari ee hore, Ethelred wuxu awooday inay is fahmaan Olaf, oo ku soo laabtay Norway si uu isugu dayo inuu boqortooyadiisa ku helo guulo isku qasan.
mt: 991 years ago, England was finally free of Danish rule. However, Ethelred was the most powerful king in the country until the arrival of Olaf Trygvasson, who was a Norwegian who wanted to conquer his country. Ethelred realized Olaf was coming, and fled to Norway to avoid him.
ref: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw. However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier. This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.

src: "Qarniga 15aad, waqooyiga Estonia ayaa ku jirtay saamaynta culus ee dhaqanka Jermanka. Qaar ka mida wadaadada Jarmalka ayaa rabay in ay Ilaahey usoo dhaweeyan dadka, sida darted waxa ay hal abuureyn luuqada Estonian-ka. Waxay ku salaysnayd alifbeetada jarmalka hal xarfan "" O/o"" ayaa lagu daray. Muddo ka dib, kelmado badan oo laga soo ergistay Jarmalka ayaa is dhalan rogay. Tani waxay ahayd bilowguu ilbaxnimada."
mt: 15th century, northern Estonia was part of the German cultural sphere. Some German settlers had the idea that God had chosen them to be the people of the Estonians. They introduced the German alphabet, replacing the Estonian letter "O/o" with the German letter "O/o". Later, many Germans moved to Estonia. This was the beginning of the Germanization of Estonia.
ref: "Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany. Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language. It was based on the German alphabet and one character ""Õ/õ"" was added. As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment."

src: Waxa jira qiyaaso kala duwan oo sheegaya inta qof ee ku hadla Hindiga. Waxa lagu qiyaasaa inay tahay inta u dhexaysa luuqadda labaad iyo afraad ee loogu hadalka badan yahay adduunka. Tirada dadka luuqadda u dhashay way kala duwan tahay iyadoo ay ku xiran in la tiriyo lahjadaha aadka ugu dhow ama in kale. Qiyaasta xajmiga l 340 milyan ilaa 500 milyan oo hadle iyo inta ugu badan 800 milyan ayaa fahmi kara luuqada. Afka Hindiga iyo Urduga ayaa ereyadooda aad isugu dhaw laakin ku kala duwan qoraalka; wada hadalka maalin walbo, dadka ku kala hadlaayo labada luuqad ayaa isfahmi karaa.
mt: 340 to 500 million people speak it as a first language, and up to 800 million as a second language. Hindi and Urdu share a common script, but their vocabularies are different; people who speak both languages can understand each other.
ref: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted. Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language. Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.

src: "Hanguel waa alifbeetada keliya ee si ula kac ah loo iqtiraacay ee maanta si caana loo adeegsado. Alifbeetada waxa la ikhtiraacay 1444 xilligii Boqor Sejong uu xilka hayay (1418-1450). Boqor Sejong waa boqorkii afraad ee Boqortooyadii Joseon iyo weliba mid ka mida kuwa loogu tixgelin badnaa. Markii hore alifbeetada Hangeul waxa uu baxshay Hunmin Jeongeum, taaso la macno aha "" codka saxda ah ee dadka lagu tilmaamo."""
mt: ʻHangul is the only alphabet ever created by a single person. The alphabet was created in 1443 by King Sejong, the fourth ruler of the Joseon Dynasty (1418-1450). King Sejong was the first king of the Joseon Dynasty and one of the most famous kings in Korean history. The original alphabet was called Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "The correct sounds for the instruction of the people."
ref: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."

Sanskrit waa luuqad qadiiimi waxayna u dhigmi kartaa luuqadda Laatinka ee lagaga hadlo Yurub. Buuggii ugu horreeyay ee dunida laga yaqaan waxaa lagu qoray Sanskrit. Isku-gaynta Upanishads-ka kadib, Sanskrit wuu baaba'ay darajo-saraysiinta awgeed. src: Dhinacyada Dayaxa waxaa lagu sameeyey dhagaxyo iyo boor/siigo. lakabka Dayaxaa waxaa loo yaqaanaa qeybta adag, Dhumucda qolafta ee dhanka dhow waa ku dhawaad 70 km dhanka durugsana waa 100 km. Waxay ka dhuuban tahay maria-ga hoostiisa waxay na ka balaaran tahay dhulka sare. Waxaa laga yaaba in geeska soo dhaw ay u badan tahay weyn maxaa yeelay qolofka ayaa dhuuban. Waxaa u fududayd in lava uu korka u soo kaco.

ref: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

src: Dad badan ayaa ku riyoodo maalinka ay bani’aadamka awood u heli doonaan inay u safraan xidig kale oo na sahmin doonaan aduuno kale, dad qaarkooda ayaa isweydiiyo waxa dibadda ka jiro kuwa na waxay aaminsan yihiin in noolaha shisheeye ama noola kale ku nool yihiin meel kale. Laakin haday tan dhacdo inkastoo la filanaynin inay dhacdo mar dhaw. Xidigyada ayaa aad sida ay u kala fog yihiin waxaa u dhexeeyo kumanaan bilyan oo mayl xidigyada oo la dhaho waa daris. Laga yaabee in maalin maalmaha ka mid ah, caruurta aad awoowga u tahay in ay isku dhex arki karaanadduun shisheeye iyagoo la yaabban cidday awowayaashood hore ahaayeen?
mt: 1. Many people are concerned that they will be replaced by robots or other forms of artificial intelligence. Some people are worried that robots will take their jobs, while others are worried that robots will take over the world. 2. However, it is unlikely that robots will take over the world in the near future. 3. Robots are currently used in a variety of industries, including manufacturing, transportation, and healthcare. 4. In the future, robots may be used in more industries, such as education and entertainment. 5. However, it is important to remember that robots are not perfect and can make mistakes. 6. It is also important to remember that robots are not human and cannot feel emotions like humans can. 7. In conclusion, robots are not a threat to humanity and will not take over the world in the near future.
ref: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are ""neighbors"". Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?"

src: "Qoraxdu ma leh oogo ta dhulka oo kale ah oo aad isku taagayso. Qoraxdu gebigeeduba waxay ka samaysan tahay neefo, dab iyo balaasma. Gaastu way khafiifaysa markasta oo aad bu'da qorraxda ka sii durugto. Qaybta sare ee aynu aragno markaynu eegno qorraxda waxa la dhahaa footosphere, taasoo la macno ah ""kubbad ilaysa""."
mt: " The fireball was not a meteorite, but a meteor. A meteor is a small piece of rock or metal that has fallen to Earth from outer space. A meteorite is a meteor that has survived the trip through the atmosphere and has landed on the ground. A meteor is a meteor that has not yet landed. The upper part of the meteor that we see is called the footosphere, which means "the bottom of the foot." "
ref: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

ref: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

src: Ilaa sadax kuno sano kadib, 1610, xidag barte Galileo Galilei ayaa waxa uu ku ogaaday telescope in Venus uu leeyahay wajiyo kala duwan, sida bisha oo kale. Inay heerku dhacaan waxa u sabab ah dhinaca Fiinas ( ama dayaxa) ee cadceeda eegaya oo qura ayaa shidma. Heerarka Fiinas waxay sii taageereen aragtidii Copernicus ee sheegaysay in meerayaashu qoraxda ku wareegaan. Dabadeed, sannado yar ka bacdii sannadkii 1639, xiddigiye Ingiriis ah oo lagu magacaabo Jeremiah Horrocks ayaa arkay muuqaalka Fiinas.
mt: 1610, Galileo Galilei discovered that Venus has phases, like the other planets. This is because of the angle at which the planet is viewed. The face of Venus is always turned toward the Sun. Later, in 1639, English astronomer Jeremiah Horrocks observed the phases of Venus.
ref: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.

src: Wabiga Amazon waa midka labaad ee ugu dheer uguna weyn aduunka. Waxa uu wadaa in kabadan 8 mar biya uu wada wabiga labaad ee aduunka ugu weyn. Wabiga Amazon ayaa ah wabiga ugu balaaran aduunka, meelo qaar isagoo balaarkiisa ka ah lix mayl. Boqolkiiba 20 buuxdo biyaha nadiifka ee wabiyada aduunka ku shubma badda waxa ay ka yimaadan webiga Amazon. Wabiga guud ee Amazon waa 6,387 km (3,980 mayl). Wuxu biyaha ka soo uruuriyaa kumanaan webi oo yaryar.
mt: 2nd largest river in the world, Amazon River, is estimated to be 8 times longer than the second longest river in the world. Amazon River is the longest river in the world, and the largest river by volume of water. The Amazon River is the largest river in the world by volume of water. The Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles) long. The Amazon River drains into the Atlantic Ocean. The Amazon River is fed by 20 major tributaries. The Amazon River is fed by two major tributaries.
ref: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.

src: Boqolkii sideetani iyo kow ka mida Reer Fenesweela ayaa bilaa camal ah, inta badan dadkaas aan shaqayni waxay ka hawlgalaan suuqyada aan rasmiga ahayn. Saddexdi muwaddin oo Venezuela oo shaqayso labo ayaa ka shaqayso qaybta adeega, afartiiba hal ayaa ka shaqeeyaa warshadaha, shantiiba meel na waxay ka shaqeeyaan beeraha. Shirkada ugumuhiimsan Venezuelans waa mida saliida, halka wadanku dhoofiyo, xitaa iskasto boqoqlkiiba hal yahay ay shirkada ka shaqayso.
mt: 3 Venezuelans are working in the informal sector. 2 are working in the agricultural sector, 1 is working in the construction sector. The most common Venezuelan company is the one that sells food, while the country is suffering from a lack of food, and the Venezuelan population is starving.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: Intii lagu jiray Dagaalkii Kacaanka, saddex iyo tobanka waddan ugu horrayntii waxay sameysteen dawlad itaal daran - oo Koonagreesku xabbada keliya ee ka tirsan yahay- taasoo hoos imanaysa Sharciga Federaalaynta. Kongareska wuxuu waayey awood uu ku soo jediyo canshuur, sababto ah waxaan jiran qaran hir gelin karo ama xukmi kara. Wuxuu isku halaynayaamaaamulada gobolada, kuwaas oo badana aan la shaqeyn, si loo xoojiyo sharciga. Sidoo kale awood uma laheyn inuu meesha ka saaro canshuurta iyo lacagaha koontorol ee gobolada. Qaybaha sharciga ayaa u baahnaa isuraac ka yimid gobolada oo dhan inta la bedelin gobolada ayaa dawladda dhexe micno badan saarin oo laga arkaayay dadka matalaayay oo mar badan iska maqnaayeen.

ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: Bilowgii madaxbanaanida qaranka, khibradda Singapore Botanic Gardens 'waxay gacan ka gaysatay in jasiiradda loo beddelo Magaalo Janno kuleyl ah. 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, ubax orchid hybrid ah, ayaa loo dooray in uu noqdo buxa qaranka.
mt: 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was named Singapore's national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Sanad walbo xiliyada Oktoobar, ku dhawaad 1.5 milyan ee xayawaanka dhirta cuno ayaa u safro bannaanada koonfurta, iyagoo goynaayo Wabiga Mara, oo ka soo goynaayo buuraha waqooyi iyagoo soo raacayo roobka. intaa kadib waxaa usoo laabneysa waqooyiga adigo maryaa galbeed, mar kaleeto waxaad ka gudbeysa wabiga Mara kadib xili roobadka Abriil meelahas. Gobolka Serengeti waxa uu ka kooban yahay Barxadda Sarengeti, Ngorongoro Conservation Area iyo Maswa Game Reserve ee ku taal Tanzania iyo Maasai Mara National Reserve oo ku taal Kenya.
mt: 1.5 million wildebeest migrated south in October, crossing the Mara River, which flows from the north, and then the Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: "Markii dagaalkii Faransiisku dhamaaday, ayuu Jarmalku bilaabay inuu isu diyaariyo inuu weeraro jasiiradda Ingiriiska. Jarmalku weerarku wuxu kood ahaan ugu baxshay "" Hawlgalka Sealion"". Hubkii cuslaa iyo aarmigii ciidamada Ingiriiska intooda badani waxay ku lumeen markii ay ka soo baxayeen Dunkirk, markaas ciidanku xoogaa daciif buu ahaa. Balse Ciidanka Badda Ingiriisku weli wuu ka xoog badnaa ka Jarmalka ee badda (""Kriegsmarine"") waxaanu burburin karayay weerar kasta oo uga soo gudba Kanaal Ingiriiska. Hase ahaate, wax aad u yar oo maraakiibta dagaalka Ingiriiska ah ayaa ka ag dhawaa waddooyinka weerarka laga soo qaadayo maadaama taliyayaasha ciidamada baddu ka baqayeen inay maraakiibtooda dejiyaan weerarada cirka ee Jarmalku."
mt: "After the French campaign ended, Germany began to prepare to invade the British island. Germany's invasion force was called the "Sealion". The British army's retreat and the German navy's bombardment of the English Channel were the most famous events of the Dunkirk evacuation. But the British navy was still strong enough to defeat the German navy in the English Channel. However, the British army was still very weak and could not defeat the German army in the land war. "
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: Aynu ku bilowno sharraxaada qorshayaasha Talyaaniga. Talyaanigu guud ahaan waxa uu Jarmalka iyo Jabbaan u ahaa “walaalka yar”. Waxay lahaayeen ciidan lugeed iyo badeed daciifa, in kastoo ay dhisteen afar markab oo cusub wax yar ka hor bilowga dagaalka. Yoolasha waawayn ee Talyaanigu waxay ahaayeen waddamada Afrika. Si ay waddamadaas u qabsadaan, waxay u baahanayeen meelo ay ciidamada ka soo kiciyaan, si ciidamadu u badmaaxi karaan badda Midhatareeniyanka oo u weerari karaan Afrika. Arinta darted, waxee ku qasbanayen in iska saaran saldhigyada Biritishka iyo maraakibta Masaarida. Marka laga reebo ficiladaa, maraakiibta dagaal ee Talyaniga lama rabin in ay sameyan wax kaleeto Hadda iyo Jabaan. Jabaan waxaa uu ahaa dal jasiirada, sida Biritan oo kale.

It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "Degitaanadii D-day iyo dagaaladii ka dambeeyay waxay xoreeyeen waqooyiga Faransiiska, balse koonfurtu wali xor ma ahayn. Waxaa xukumay ""Vichy"" Faransiiska. Waxa ay ahaayen dad faransiis ah oo hishiis nabadeed lagalay Jarmalka sanadka markuu ahaa 1940, wada shaqeyna ay ka dhaxeyse intii ay la dagaali lahaayen cadowga kusoo duulay. 15 kii ogosto 1940 kii, Isbahaysiga ayaa weeraray koonfurta faransiiska, duulaanka waxaa lagu magacaabay ""hawlgalka fardaha"". Labo isbuuc gudahooda oo keli ciidamada Maraykanka iyo Faransiiska Xorta ayaa xoreeyey koonfurta Faransiiska waxayna u sii jeesanayeen Jermanka."
mt: 1940, the Vichy French government was established in southern France, but the rest of the country was occupied by Germany. On August 15, 1940, the Free French Forces attacked southern France, and the two Allied armies of the United States and France liberated southern France and defeated Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Talyaaniga arrimahiisa ku aaddan Waqooyiga Afrika uma hagaagin bilowgiiba. Isla todobaadkii Talyaaniga ku dhawaqay dagaalka, 10-kii Juun 1940, ayay 11th Hussars ka Ingiriisku qabsadeen Qalcadda Capuzzo ee Liibiya. Weerar gaadmo ah oo ka dhacay bariga Bardia, Ingiriiska waxay ku qabsadeen Madaxa Injineerada Ciidanka Tobnaad ee Talyaaniga, Jeneraal Lastucci. 28 kii Juun, Maarshaal Italo Balbo, oo ahaa Gudooymiyihii Guud ee Liibiya iyo dhaxal-sugihii Mussolin, waxa dilay xabbad saaxiibtiinimo mar uu ku soo degayay Tobruk.
mt: 10 June 1940, the 11th Hussars of the British Army captured the Italian-held port of Capuzzo in Libya. The Italian 10th Army, under General Lastucci, was defeated in the Battle of Bardia. On 28 June, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and Mussolini's deputy, was killed by friendly fire as he arrived in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Buudhiiska Tibetan waxay ku salaysan tahay casharadii Budha, balse waxa sii fidiyay dariiqa jacaylka ee Mahayaanka iyo farsamooyin laga keenay Yoogada Hindiya. Sharciyan Buudhiiska Tibetan aad buu u fududyahay. Waxay ka kooban tahay Kundalini Yoga, khushuuc iyo wadiiqo jacayl dhammaysa ah. Marka la sameeyo Kundalini Yoga, xooga Kundalini loo yaqaano (xooga iftiiminta) ayaa lagu kiciyaa qaab istaaga, jimicsiga neefsashada, ereyo lagu celceliyo, iyo waxyaabo la sawirto. Khushuucda Tibetan waxa sal u ah Deity Yoga. Iyadoo la eegayo rooxaamaha kala duwan ayaa waddooyinka tamarta la nadiifiya, qaarna waa la kiciyaa soo jeeditaanna waa la abuuraa.
mt: 1. The Tibetan Buddhist tradition is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but it is not limited to the teachings of the Buddha. It includes Kundalini Yoga, Khushuuc, and Wadiiqo. 2. ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Barnaamijku waxa uu bilaabmay 8:30 galabnimo ee waqtiga maxalliga ah (15:00 UTC). Faaniinta caanka ah ee waddanka oo dhan ayaa soo bandhiga bhajans, ama heeso hilow ah, iyagoo u soo diraya dhanka cagaha Shyam. Waxaa fiidki bilaabay heesaa Sanju Sharma, waxaa ku xigsaday Jai Shankar Choudhary. Chhappan bhog bhajan ayaa sidoo kale ku biiray. Waxana isagu wehlinayay heesaa Raju Khandelwal. Ka dib, Lakkha Singh wuxuu qaatay hogaaminta heesta bhajan. 108 bilaydh oo kamida chhappan Bhog (kamida Hindida, 56 shay oo kaladuwan kuna haboon waxku cusista, sida macmacaanka, khudaarta,lawska, digaaga iwm. Kuwasi oo lo isticmalo sharaf ahaan) ayaa loogu adeegay Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh waxay soo bandhigtay sidoo chhappan bhog bhajan. Heesaa,raju Khandelwal ayaa u muuqday isaga.
mt: 108 offerings of chhappan Bhog (including 56 shay and the rest in the form of fruits, sweets, and other food items) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh then led the bhajan. The bhajan was sung by Sanju Sharma, and Jai Shankar Choudhary. Chhappan bhog bhajan was also sung. Raju Khandelwal then took the lead. After that, Lakkha Singh took the lead again. 108 offerings of chhappan Bhog (including 56 shay and the rest in the form of fruits, sweets, and other food items) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh then led the bhajan. The bhajan was sung by Sanju Sharma, and Jai Shankar Choudhary. Chhappan bhog bhajan was also sung. Raju Khandelwal then took the lead. After that, Lakkha Singh took the lead again.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Dabbaaldegyada ayaa ku bilaabmay bandhig gaara oo uu soo qaban qaabiyay kooxda adduunka ka caanka ah ee Cirque du Soleil. Waxaa xigay Koox-heesaadka Simfoniga Gobolka Istanbul (Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra), baandeyda Janissari (a Janissary band), iyo heesaayaasha Fatih Erkoç iyo Müslüm Gürses. Ka dib Whirling Dervishes ayaa masraxa ka khudbeeyay. Fanaanta Turkida Sezen Aksu ayaa la heestay fanaanka Talyaaniga Alessandro Safina iyo fanaanka Greek Haris Alexiou. Si loo dhameeyoo, ciyaarta Turkish kooxda Dabka ee Anatolia waxay qabteen barnaamijka “nidaamka misaanka”.
mt: 2010 Istanbul International Music Festival opened with a concert by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. The concert was accompanied by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, the Janissary band, and the Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses orchestras. The Whirling Dervishes then performed. Turkish singer Sezen Aksu was joined by Italian singer Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The Anatolian Dabka Turkish dance group also performed, with the “dance of the dervishes” as the finale.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Rakaabka waxa la saiiyay biyo intay kulka 90(f) digrii ah wax ku sugayeen. Kabtanka dabdamiska, Skot Kouns, wuxu yidhi “ Santa Clara maalintu way kululayd heerkulkuna waxa uu ahaa 90meeyo. Waqti kasta oo qofku ku xayiran yahay roolar koostarku waa mid bilaa raaxo ah, markay ugu yartahay, waxaanay ku qaadatay ugu yaraan hal saac in qofkii u horeeyay la soo rogo."""
mt: 90 degrees Fahrenheit is 32 degrees Celsius. Santa Clara Fire Chief Scott Knight said, "Santa Clara was 90 degrees. Every time someone is injured, it's a serious injury. When it's hot, it's worse."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Marka loo eego warbixintii ugu danbaysay, akhrinta heerka badda ee ay inna tusisay duufaanta tsunami ayaa lasoo saaray. Waxaa jiray woxoogaa dhaqdhaqaaqyo aan dhamaanayn oo ay keentay duufaantu kuwaasi oo laga diwaangaliyay aagaga Pago Pago iyo Niue. Wax dhaawacyo ama burbur wayn ah laguma sheegayn Tonga, balse korontada ayaa si ku meel gaar ah u tagtay, taasoo sida la sheegay maamulka Tongan u diiday inay helaan digniinta suunaamida ay soo saareen PTWC. Afar iyo toban iskool oo ku yaala Hawaii ama u dhaw xeebaha ayaa la xidhay dhamaantood arbacadii halkii looga digi lahaa.
mt: 2:30 pm local time (0230 UTC) the latest report, the tsunami wave has been cancelled. There was no damage reported in Tonga, but the country's government has issued a tsunami warning. Hawaii and the surrounding islands were evacuated, but no damage was reported.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Marka loo eego warbixintii ugu danbaysay, akhrinta heerka badda ee ay inna tusisay duufaanta tsunami ayaa lasoo saaray. Waxaa jiray woxoogaa dhaqdhaqaaqyo aan dhamaanayn oo ay keentay duufaantu kuwaasi oo laga diwaangaliyay aagaga Pago Pago iyo Niue. Wax dhaawacyo ama burbur wayn ah laguma sheegayn Tonga, balse korontada ayaa si ku meel gaar ah u tagtay, taasoo sida la sheegay maamulka Tongan u diiday inay helaan digniinta suunaamida ay soo saareen PTWC. Afar iyo toban iskool oo ku yaala Hawaii ama u dhaw xeebaha ayaa la xidhay dhamaantood arbacadii halkii looga digi lahaa.
mt: 2:30 pm local time (0230 UTC) the latest report, the tsunami wave has been cancelled. There was no damage reported in Tonga, but the country's government has issued a tsunami warning. Hawaii and the surrounding islands were evacuated, but no damage was reported.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, darawaal-caawiyaha kooxda A1GP New Zealand, ayaa si sharciyan ah maanta taariikh uga dhigay ka dib markii u ka dheereeyay 48-jirka ee sameeyay isagoo wadista ugu dheereeya ku haya Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, Mudane Reid wuxuu maamuley in uu kaxeeyo gaariga New Zealand ee A1Gp ee Quruxda Madowga xawaarahiisa yahay 160km/h wuxuu todobo jeer ku wareejiyey buundada/biriijka. Booliska New Zealand waxa ay dhib ku qabeyn isticmaalka qoryaha raaderka xawaare marka la fiiriyo xawaaraha uu mudane Reid ku socday sababto ah sida ay u gaabiyan Black Beauty, marka ay booliska fursad uheleyn waxa ay aheyd marka mudane Reid uu gaabiye ilaa 160km/sacadi.
mt: 48-year-old Johnny Reid, the driver of the A1GP New Zealand team, was seriously injured today after breaking the speed record for the Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand. Reid, who was driving the A1GP New Zealand car, set a speed of 160 km/h, breaking the previous record of 150 km/h. He was airlifted to hospital after breaking the record four times. The New Zealand police were called to the scene after the record was broken, but were unable to stop the car before it reached the speed limit of 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Dhulgariir dhexdhexaad ah ayaa ka qarxay galbeedka montana 10:08 galin danbe isniintii. Wax xog bixin degdeg ah ee dhibaata ma aysan helin Sahanka Cilmiga dhulka ee Mareykanka (USGS) iyo Xarunta Xogta Dhul Gariir ee Qaranka. Dhulka gariirka waxa u xudun ahayd meel waqooyi-bari Dillon u jirta ilaa 20 km ( 15 mayl) ilaa 65 km (40 mayl) na Koonfur ka xigta Butte.
mt: 10:08 am local time, a 4.8 magnitude earthquake struck southern Montana. The USGS and the USGS Earthquake Center have not yet released details. The earthquake was felt 20 km (15 miles) north of Dillon to 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Xabsiga Abu Gharib ee Ciraaq ayaa dab la qabadsiiyay intii rabshaduhu socdeen. Xabsigu wuxuu mid xumaan ku caan baxay noqday markii tacadiyadiisii la ogaaday markii halkaas ciidamada Maraykanku qabsadeen.
mt: 2004 Abu Ghraib torture and prisoner abuse scandal in Iraq was revealed when the photos were leaked. The prison was notorious for the torture and abuse of prisoners.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Koox muusikada ayaa buriyay bandhigga lagu qaban rabay Garoonka Xusuusta Dagaalka Maui, oo qorsheysnaa inay kasoo qayb galaan ilaa 9,000 oo qof, iyagoo raali galiyay taageereyaasha. Shirkada maareysa kooxda, HK Management Inc., ma aysan sheegin wax sabab hore ah marka ay baajiyen 20 Sibteembar, laakin maalinti xigtay ayee sheegen eeda ine tahay sababo diyaar garow xumo ine aheyd
mt: 9,000 people were expected to attend the concert, which was being organized by HK Management Inc. The company did not immediately say what caused the accident, which occurred on Saturday, but the concert promoter said the cause was not immediately known.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Boob baahsan ayaa sida la sheegay sii socday habeenimadii oo dhan, maadaama saraakiisha nidaam fulintu ka maqnaayeen wadooyinka Bishkek. Korjooge ayaa ku tilmaamay Bishkek inay gelayso “khalkhal”, isla markaas oo burcad ay waddooyinka qaadayeen kan dhacayeen dukaamada alaabooyinka iyo badeecooyinka. In kamida deeganka Bishkek ayaa eedeynaya mudaaharadlayaasah ka yimid koonfurta shari la'aanta ka jirto.
mt: 1 person was killed, and 2 others were injured, according to police. The explosion was heard in Bishkek, and the city's airport was closed. At least one of the city's airports was damaged.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Waqtigii hore, Madaxa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, wuxuu calamadiyey shirkadu iney bilaabmatay marka uu qambaleelka/jaraska albaabkiisu codkiisu aan laga maqli Karin dukaan kiisa garaashka ku dhexyaalay. Wuxu yidhi, wuxu sameeyay wuxu dhisay jalas albaabeed WiFi ah. Simioff wuxu yidhi iibka waxa kor u qaaday ka soo muuqashadiisii uu ka muuqday Shark Tank 2013kii halkaasoo guddida bandhigu diideen inay maalgeliyaan shirkadda yar. Sanadka markuu ahaa 2017, Simioff wuxuu ku so muuqday Kanaal taleefeshin dukaamaysi ee QVC. Ring sidoo kale waxay xallisay dacwad kala dhexaysay shirkad Amni oo la loolantamaysay, ee ah  ADT Corporation.
mt: Previously, Ring founder Jamie Siminoff had pitched his company on the reality show Shark Tank in 2013, where the sharks had passed on the opportunity to invest in the company. In 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Ring also partnered with ADT Corporation, a home security company.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "Bandhiga PBS waxa uu helay in ka badan laba dersin oo abaalmarinaha Emmy ah, intuu socdayna waxa uu ka yaryahay oo keliya Sesame Street iyo Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Xalqad walba barnaamijka wuxuu diirada saaraya hal ku dhiga gaar ah buuga wuxuna soo saaray thal ku dhig isagoo ka sheekaynaya sheekooyin kala duwan. Bandhig walbo ayaa sidoo kale talo bixin siin dono caruurta buugaga ay ka raadsan doonaan maktabada markay tagaan. John Grant, oo ka soda WNED Buffalo ( Isteeshinka Guriga Jeegaanta Akhriska) ayaa yidhi ""Jeegaanta Akhrisku waxay caruurta bartay akhriska,... jacaylka akhriska — [shoow] waxaanay caruurta ku dhiirigeliyeen inay buug akhristaan"". Dadka qaar ayaa rumaysan, sida John Grant, in go’aanka maalgelineed iyo isbeddelka falsafadeed ee waxbarashada talafeeshinku ay gacan ka geysteen dhammaynta taxanaha."

ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Saraakiisha magaalada Amsterdam iyo Matxafka Anne Frank ayaa sheegay in geedka uu qabo xanuun ka imaaday fungus uu na halis caafimaad gelinaayo dadwaynaha iyagoo sheegaayo inuu halis ugu jiray inuu dumo. Waxaa loo asteeyay in la jaro Salaasada, balse waa badbaaday kadib markii uu soo baxay sharci maxkamadeed degdeg ahi.
mt: 2 people in Amsterdam and Anne Frank House have been infected with a fungus that can cause blindness and death. They were told to stay away from the museum, but they were acquitted of charges of violating the quarantine.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Xoreynta Xayawaanka iyo Bulshada Ka Hortaga Axmaqnimada Xoolaha (RSPCA) ayaa mar kale dalbanaya qasab ka dhigista in dhammaan xero-dhiigyada Ustareeliya lagu cidho kamaradaha CCTV. Kormeeraha guud RSPCA ee New South Wales, David O'Shannessy ayaa BBC da u sheegay in kormeerka iyo duljoogteynta xero dhiigyadu ay noqto wax ka caadi ah Ustareeliya. ""CCTV-da waxa ay fariin culus u direysa dadka ka shaqeeyo xayawaanada in bad qabkoodu yahay muhiimada koowaad."""
mt: "The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) has been criticised again for its use of CCTV cameras to monitor the welfare of animals. New South Wales RSPCA chief executive David O'Shannessy told the BBC that the use of CCTV and surveillance was a "very important first step"."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Warka ayaa ku faafay bulshada harda cas manta, markii jeff iyo sadex kale oo dhibanayaan ahi sheegeen in ardey kale lagu xidhay iyadoo lala xidhiidhinayo toogashadii iskoolka ka dhacday 21kii maarso. Maamulku wax yarbay ka dhaheen rasmiyan inay xaqiijiyeen xariga maanta maahane. Sikastaba ha noqotee illaha aqoonta uleh baaritaanka ayaa u sheegay warsidaha Minneapolis _tribune in ay tahay louis Traveldan ,16 jir wiil u dhashay qabiilka Red Lake. Xilligan lama oga dembiyada la soo oogay iyo waxa ku riixay maamulka ilmaha balse dhegaysiyada hore dacwada ayaa ka bilaabmay maxkamada federaalka.
mt: 21 March 2005, a gunman killed 10 people at a high school in Red Lake, Minnesota. The shooter was a 16-year-old boy of the Red Lake tribe. He was killed by police. The Minneapolis Tribune reported that the boy was Louis Traveldan. The FBI is investigating.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Qabanqaabiyayaasha mudahaaradka ayaa sheegay inay ku dhawaad 100,000 oo qof isugu soo baxeen magaalooyinka Jarmalka sida Baaliin, Cologne, Hamburg, iyo Hanover. Baarliin, booliisku mudaharadayaasha waxay ku qiyaaseen 6,500. Mudaharaado aya sidoo kale ka dhacay Baariis, Sofia da Bulgaria, Vilnius da Lithuania, Valetta ta Malta, Tallinn ta Estonia, iyo Edinburgh iyo Glasgow ta Scotland. London, ku dhawaad 200 qof ayaa ka hor mudaharaaday afaafka xafiisyada haystayaasha xuquuqda daabicista. Bishii la soo dhaafay, muddaharaado waawayn ayaa ka dhacay Poland markii waddankaasi saxeexay ACTA, taasoo dawladda Poland ku riixday inaanay saxeexin heshiiska, hadda uun. Latvia iyo Slovakia waxay labadooduba dib u dhigeen ku biiristooda ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people have been reported to have protested in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. Berlin, the largest protest, had 6,500 people. Protests also occurred in Brussels, Sofia, Bulgaria, Vilnius, Lithuania, Valetta, Malta, Tallinn, Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow, Scotland. London, with 200 people, also protested at the offices of the ACTA negotiators. In February, protests occurred in Poland after the country signed ACTA, prompting Poland to withdraw from the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia also withdrew from ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Ku dhawaad 60 kiis oo iPods kululaaday ah ayaa la soo sheegay, taas baa sababtay lix dab oo kacay afar qofna gubitaan fudud baa haleelay. Wasaaradda dhaqaalaha, ganacsiga iyo warshadaha ee Jabbaan ( meti) ayaa sheegtay inay ka warheshay 27 shil oo la xariiro aaladaha. Isbuuca lasoo dhaafay, METI ayaa ku dhawaaqday in Apple ay ogeysiyeen dhacdooyin kuleel xad dhaaf ah, ay shirkadda ku tilmaantay “kuwa aan muhiim ahayn.” Wasaarada ayaa ku jawaabtay inay dib u digidda warbixinta Apple ku tilmaamaan “wax aad loga xumaado.”
mt: 60 iPods were reported stolen, causing six fires and injuring four people. The Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it had filed a complaint against Apple for 27 million yen. Apple responded that it was “not aware of any issues.” METI said Apple was “not taking this seriously.”
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Gudoomiyaha Apple Steve Jobs ayaa soo bandhigay qalabka isagoo ku socday masraxa ka dibna ka soo baxsaday iPhone-ka jeebkiisa jiiniska. Hadalkiisii 2-da saacadood ahaa wuxu ku sheegay ""Maanta Apple waxay rabtaa inay dib u ikhtiraacdo telefoonka, Maanta waxaynu dhigaynaa taariikh""."
mt: 2:00 PM EST, Steve Jobs, CEO of Apple, announced the release of the iPhone, a new type of phone. He said, "Today Apple is releasing a phone, Today we are releasing a history."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Xilibaanka aqalka sare ee iminka iyo marwada koowad ee wadanka Argentine Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ayaa ku dhawaaqday musharax nimadeeda madaxweyne shalay fiidki La Plata, magaalada 50 kilometers (31 miles) u jirta Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner waxay ku dhawaaqday inay u tartamayso madaxwaynaha Tiyaatarma Argentina, isla halkii ay 2005 kii ka bilaabi jirtay olalaheeda xubinta Senate ka ee gobolka Buenos Aires.
mt: 2007 Argentine presidential candidate Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president on Monday in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner said she would run against incumbent President Néstor Kirchner, her husband, who took office in 2005 as a senator from Buenos Aires Province.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "Peter Costello, oo ah khasnad hayaha Australia iyo ninka logu malaynaayo inuu kala wareegi doono Raysal Wasaaraha John Howard xilka hogaamiyaha xisbiga Liberal ayaa taageero siiyay warshad quwadda nukliyeerka ee Australia. Mudane Costello wuxuu yiri awooda soo saarida nukliyeerka ay noqoneyso dhaqaale ahaan guuleysan kara, Australia waa in ay bilowda isticmaalidiisa. ""Haddii ay noqoto ganacsi , waan heli doonaa. Waa sidaa, ma jiraan wax sharciga kasoo hor jeeda awooda nukliyeerka ee Costello aya sidaa yidhi."""
mt: "Peter Costello, who is also the treasurer of Australia and the man who will succeed John Howard as the leader of the Liberal party, has supported the nuclear power industry. Costello said that the nuclear power industry would be a boon to the economy and Australia would be able to use it. ""If it becomes a business, I will support it. It is a good thing, there is no need to change the nuclear power industry as Costello said."""
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."
