src: Wax ka baddalka la soo jeediyay horey ayay uga gudubtay labada aqalba sannadkii 2011. Fadhiga sharci dejinta ayaa isbeddel sameeyay ka dib markii xukunkii labaad ay ugu horreyntii masaxeen Golaha Shacabku ee Isniinta qaab la mid ah loogu gudbiyay Senate ka. Guul darada xukunka labaad, oo dooneyso inay mamnuucdo guurka labada jinsi oo isleh, ayaa irid u furi kartaa guurarka sharci ee mustaqbalka. Raacida nidaamka, HJR-3 waxaa dib loo eegi doona doorashada xigta diiwan gelinta ee 2015 ama 2016 waxa hadhay.
mt: 2011 saw the first time the state legislature voted to override a veto. The second override, in 2013, was the first time the legislature voted to override a veto of a bill that had passed with a supermajority. The override of HJR-3, which would have put a constitutional amendment on the ballot to ban same-sex marriage, was the first override of a bill that had passed with a supermajority.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """Waraaqaha Baanama"" waa kelmad guud oo koobsanaysa ku dhawaad toban milyan oo dukumeenti oo laga helay shirkad sharciyeeda Reer Baanama Mossack Fonseca, kuwaasoo saxaafadda hoosta looga dhiibay gugii 2016. Dukumeentiyadu waxay tusinayaan in afar iyo toban bangi ka caawiyeen macaamiil qani ah qarsashada balaayin doolarka Maraykanka ah si ay uga baxsadaan cashuurta iyo shuruuco kale. Jariiradda Ingiriiska ee The Guardian ayaa soo jeedisay in Bangiga Deutsche uu maamulo ku dhowaad saddex meelood meel shirkadaha beenta ah ee tan lagu gaadhay. Waxaa dhacay banaan baxyo aduunka oo dhan, dhawr dacwo la soo oogay, ka dib na hogaamiyeyaalka dawladaha Iceland iyo Bakistan ayaa labadaba is casilay."

ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: """Waraaqaha Baanama"" waa kelmad guud oo koobsanaysa ku dhawaad toban milyan oo dukumeenti oo laga helay shirkad sharciyeeda Reer Baanama Mossack Fonseca, kuwaasoo saxaafadda hoosta looga dhiibay gugii 2016. Dukumeentiyadu waxay tusinayaan in afar iyo toban bangi ka caawiyeen macaamiil qani ah qarsashada balaayin doolarka Maraykanka ah si ay uga baxsadaan cashuurta iyo shuruuco kale. Jariiradda Ingiriiska ee The Guardian ayaa soo jeedisay in Bangiga Deutsche uu maamulo ku dhowaad saddex meelood meel shirkadaha beenta ah ee tan lagu gaadhay. Waxaa dhacay banaan baxyo aduunka oo dhan, dhawr dacwo la soo oogay, ka dib na hogaamiyeyaalka dawladaha Iceland iyo Bakistan ayaa labadaba is casilay."
mt: 11.5 million pages of documents leaked by the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which was founded by the Mossack brothers and the Fonseca brothers, were published by the international media in 2016. The documents show that 12 of the 14 members of the German Bundestag, the lower house of the German parliament, have been involved in tax evasion or other financial crimes. ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Shilalka hawada ayaa ku badan Iiraan, taasi oo leh diyaarado gaboobay kuwaasi oo weliba si xun loo dayactiray hadday tahay kuwa ciidanka iyo kuwan dadweynaha labadaba. Cunaqabateynta caalamiga waxa ay ka dhigneyd in diyaarad cusub lasoo gadan karin. Isbuucan bilowgiisa, diyaarad ay leyahin boliska ayaa burburtay sadex qof way ku dhimatay sadexna way ku dhawacantay. Bisha lasoo dhaafay ayay Iran wajahday musiibada hawada ee ugu xumayd dhawr sana gudaheeda ka dib mar diyaarad u socotay Armenia dhacday, oo na dishay 168 qof oo saarneed. Isla bishaas ayee aheed markii diyaarad kale ay ka gudubtay wadadi ay ku socotay ee Mashhad kuna dhacde darbi, taaso dishay toban iyo todobo.
mt: 1. The crash occurred in Iran, where both military and civilian aircraft are routinely shot down. The crash comes as the world is increasingly concerned about the safety of new aircraft. 2. The crash killed three people and injured three others. 3. The crash occurred just days after a plane crash in Armenia killed 168 people. 4. The crash occurred just days after a plane crash in Mashhad killed 10 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Kooxda Cilmi Baadhista Ciraaq waxay warbixintooda soo jeediyeen 12.00 GMT maanta. Waxay ka digaysaa inaanu qofna dammaanad qaadi karin in tallaabo kastaa la qaadaa xilligan joojin karayn dagaalka, qalalaase koraya, ama khalkhal galka dalka Ciraaq. Warbixinta ayaa ku bilaabanayso codsi lagu codsanaayo dood furan iyo abaabulka midnimo Maraykanka dhexdiisa oo ku saabsan sharciga Bariga Dhexe. Warbixintu si wayn ayay u dhaleecaynaysaa qayb kasta oo ka mida siyaasadda hadda ee Fulinta ee ku aaddan Ciraaq waxayna si adag ugu talinaysa in si degdeg ah wax loo beddelo. Iyadoo ugu horeyso talooyinka 78 ayaa ah in hindisi diblomaasiyeed la qaado sanadkan intuu dhamaanin ka hor si loga ilaalliyo xuduudaha Iraq soo galgalka cadow iyo in dib loola abaabulo xiriirada diblomaasiyeed ay la leedahay dersikeeda.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraqi Science Community announced that we will not accept any solution to the current crisis, whether it is a ceasefire, a truce, or a diplomatic solution. The statement also said that the current political situation in Iraq is not acceptable and that the solution must be a complete change. The statement also said that the 78th solution is to accept a diplomatic solution before the end of the year, to establish a border between Iraq and Syria, and to establish a diplomatic solution to the current crisis.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Sida Ansa sheegay, ""booliisku waxay ka warwar qabeen laba jugood oo heer sareeyay oo ka baqeen inay kiciyaan dagaal buuxa. Booliisku waxay sheegeen in Lo Piccolo gacan sarreeyay maadaama uu ahaa gacanta midig ee Provenzano ee Palermo u joogta khibradiisa waynina waxay u goysay ixtiraamka jiilasha boosaska ka wayn isaga intay raacayaan siyaasadda Provenzano ee ah is qarinta iyadoo haddana awoodda shabakadada la xoojinayo. Madaxda uu xukumi jiray Provenzano marka uu joojiyay dagaalki Riina ee looga soo horjeday gobolada dilay dadkii u doodi jiray Mafiyada Giovanni Falcone iyo Paolo Borsellino sanadka markuu ahaa 1992."""

ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Tartamaha ciyaarta dagaalka Hitoshi Saito oo u dhashay dalka Jabaan oo horaan reeyay labo dahab oo Ciyaraha Olambikada ayaa ku geeriyooday da’da 54. Sababta dhimashada ayaa lagu dhawaaqay inay ahayd in ahayd kansarka ku dhaca dhuunta isku xidha beerka iyo xameetida. Waxa uu ku dhintay Osaka Talaadadii. Isagoo hore u ahaa Horyaalkii Adduunka iyo Olambikada, ayuu haddana Saito ahaa gudoomiyaha Judo Federation ka ee Jabbaaniiska markii u dhintay.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judo champion Hitoshi Saito died of cancer. He was a former world and Olympic champion and the president of the Japanese Judo Federation.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

It also caused a major earthquake in India, which killed over 100 people.

src: 3 bilood ee ugu danbese, in kabadan 80 maxbuus ayaa laga sii daayay xarunta Dhaxe ee Diwaan gelinta ayagoon wax danbi ah lagu edeyn. Abril sannadkan, xukun xayiraada ayuu xarunta ku soo riday Xaakim Glyne si uu dhaqan geliyo sii daynta kuwii la haystay in ka badan 24 saacadood ka dib markii la qabtay ee aanay dacwadooda dhegaysanin maxkamadi. Gudoomiyaha ayaa qoondeeyo damiinashada, hadii la ogolaado, wuxuu na rasmi ka dhigaa dacwada uu ku soo qortay saraakiilka soo xiray shakhsiga. Dacwadda ayaa ka dib na la geliyaa diiwaanka kombuyuutarka gobolka halkaasi na kiiska lagala socon karo. Dhageysiga kiiska ayaa sidoo kale calaamadeyneyso taariikhda tuhunsanaha xaqa uu u leeyahay maxkamad dhaqso ah.
mt: 3 people were killed, at least 80 injured in a blast at the Dhaka airport. In April, the court sentenced the accused to death for the murder of more than 24 people after being arrested. The chairman is awaiting the verdict, if acquitted, he will officially be sentenced to death. The trial was later transferred to the district court. The trial was also postponed for the first time in the history of the court.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: 3 bilood ee ugu danbese, in kabadan 80 maxbuus ayaa laga sii daayay xarunta Dhaxe ee Diwaan gelinta ayagoon wax danbi ah lagu edeyn. Abril sannadkan, xukun xayiraada ayuu xarunta ku soo riday Xaakim Glyne si uu dhaqan geliyo sii daynta kuwii la haystay in ka badan 24 saacadood ka dib markii la qabtay ee aanay dacwadooda dhegaysanin maxkamadi. Gudoomiyaha ayaa qoondeeyo damiinashada, hadii la ogolaado, wuxuu na rasmi ka dhigaa dacwada uu ku soo qortay saraakiilka soo xiray shakhsiga. Dacwadda ayaa ka dib na la geliyaa diiwaanka kombuyuutarka gobolka halkaasi na kiiska lagala socon karo. Dhageysiga kiiska ayaa sidoo kale calaamadeyneyso taariikhda tuhunsanaha xaqa uu u leeyahay maxkamad dhaqso ah.
mt: 3 people were killed, at least 80 injured in a blast at the Dhaka airport. In April, the court sentenced the accused to death for the murder of more than 24 people after being arrested. The chairman is awaiting the verdict, if acquitted, he will officially be sentenced to death. The trial was later transferred to the district court. The trial was also postponed for the first time in the history of the court.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: "Ilaa iyo markii Bakistaan xorriyada ka qaadatay xukunkii Ingiriiska 1947, Madaxwaynaha Bakistaan wuxu u magacaabi jiray ""Wakiilo Siyaasadeed"" si ay u maamulaan FATA, kuwaasoo si ku dhow madax bannaani u kaantarooli jiray aagagaaas. Wakiiladaasi waxay ka masuul yihiin bixinta adeegyada sharciyeed ee dawladda ee ku yaal Xeerka 247 ee Dastuurka Bakistaan."
mt: 1947, Pakistan's prime minister was called "Chief Executive" to oversee the FATA, which was a tribal area. The chief executive was responsible for the administration of the state under the 247th article of the Pakistani constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Filimka, ay ku jiraan Ryan Gosling iyo Emma Stone, waxa la soo magaacaabay dhammaan noocyada waawayn. Goslin iyo Stone ayaa loo soo saaray inay u tartamaqn Jilaaga iyo Jilaayadda ugu fiican siday u kala horeeyaan. Magacaabista kale waxaa ku jira Sawirada ugu Wanaagsan, Agaasimaha, Filmaanta, Diyaarinta Dharka, Diyaarinta Filimka, Muqaalka Asalka, Diyaarinta Waxsoosarka, Diyaarinta Codka, Cod isku geynta, iyo Muuqaalka Fican ee lagu Soo deynayo Dhalada. Laba heesoo oo laga keenay filimka, Audition ( Doqomada Riyooda) iyo Magaalada Xiddigaha, ayaa helay inay u tartamaan heesta asalka ah ee ugu wacan. Istuudiyaha Lionsgate waxa uu helay 26 magacaabiseed - taasoo ka badan istuudiye kale oo kasta.

ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK ayaa sidoo kale sheegtay in warshadda quwadda nukliyeerka Kashiwazaki Kariwa ee ku taalo Niigata ay si caadi ah u shaqaynaysay. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. waxay soo waxay sheegtay inaan dhulgariirkii wax saameyn ah ku yeelaan. iTiradaasna waxay ahayd1 iyo 2 kimikada iwaxaana la damiyayawooda shirkada nukliyeerka. Waxaa la sheegay in 9400 guriyo oo deegaanka ay biyo la’aan yihiim iyo ku dhawaad 100 ay koronto la’aan yihiin. Waddooyinka qaar baa dhaawacmay, adeega tareenada ayaa meelaha wax ka dhaceen kala go'ay, Madaarka Noto ee Ishikawa isna wali waa xiran yahay.
mt: 1 and 2 nuclear reactors at the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata were shut down after a small earthquake. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: "Waxuu ku dhashay Hong Kong, Ma waxa uu dhigtay Jaamacada New York iyo Dugsiga Sharciga ee Harvard marna waxa uu lahaa kaarka degganaasha rasmiga ee Mareykanka ""green card"". Hsieh wuxuu wafaqay inta lagu guda jirey doorashada taas Ma uu ka duuli kara wada inta lagu guda jiro waqtiga masiibada. Hsieh waxa uu ku doode in photogenic Ma uu ka isteel fiican yahay waxa. In kastoo eedaym ay jiraan, Ma waxa uu si fiican ugu guulaystay inuu xiriir dhow la yeesho dhulwaynaha Shiineeska."
mt: 1. "He was born in Hong Kong, and attended New York University and Harvard Business School, and has a green card, the U.S. immigration permit. Hsieh was a candidate for the city council, and is now a city council member. Hsieh is photogenic and handsome. Despite his youth, he won the election. Hsieh is very popular."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Markay caddaatay in qoysas badani ay raadinayaan taageero sharci si ay ula dagaalaan guryo ka saarista, ayaa shir lagu qabtay Xarunta Sharciga Bulshada ee East Bay 20kii bisha Maaj kaasoo loogu talo galay dadka lagu dhibay khiyaanada guriyaynta. Markay kireysteyaasha isu sheegeen waxa ku dhacay, badi qoysaska ku dhex jiray arrinta ayaa isla markii fahmay in Carolyn Wilson ee shirkadda OHA ay dhacday lacagtii dhigashada, ka dib na magaalada ka baxsatay. Kiraystayaasha degan Lockwood Gardens ayaa rumaysan inay jiri karaan 40 qoys ama in ka badan oo kale oo la saari karo, maadaama ay ogaadeen in booliisia OHA ay sidoo kale baaris ku wadaan guryaha dadwaynaha ee Oakland ee laga yaabo inay khiyaanada guriyaynta ku jireen.
mt: 20kii bisha Maaj, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Law Center to discuss the eviction of many families. When the tenants heard that Carolyn Wilson of OHA had been evicted, she then left the city. Tenants of Lockwood Gardens said they were being evicted, and that OHA was also evicting other families in Oakland, where they were being displaced by gentrification.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Tartanka ka dib Keselowski ayaa wali ah hogaamiyaha taratanka Drivers' Championship isagoo wato 2,250 dhibcood. Todabo dhibic ayuu dambeyaa, Johnson ayaa laba ah asagoo haysta 2,243 dhibac. Kaalinta saddexaad, Hamlin ayaa labaatan dhibcood danbeeya, balse shan ka horeeya Bowyer. Kahne iyo Truex, Jr. iyana waxay ku jiraan kaalinta shanaad iyo lixaad siday u kala horeeyaan iyagoo kala wata 2,220 iyo 2,207 dhibcood. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, iyo Harvick ayaa ciriirsaday tobanka boos ee ugu sareeya Horyaalka Darawalada iyadoo xilligan afar tartan ka hareen.
mt: 1. Keselowski 2,250 points 2. Johnson 2,243 points 3. Hamlin 2,220 points 4. Bowyer 2,207 points 5. Kahne 2,207 points 6. Truex, Jr. 2,207 points 7. Stewart 2,200 points 8. Gordon 2,200 points 9. Kenseth 2,200 points 10. Harvick 2,200 points
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Waxa la rumaysan yahay inay tani tahay markii shanaad ee dadku arkaan shay kiimiko ahaan loo xaqiijiyay inuu Maaras ka yimi oo Dhulka ku soo dhacay. Ku dhawaad 24,000 cirjiidheed ee la og yahay inay ku soo dhaceen Dhulka, keliya ilaa 34 ayaa la caddeeyay inay ka yimaadeen maaris. 15 oo ka mid ah dhegaxyadan ayaa ka yimaadeen dhagaxyada hawada sare ka soo daatay Luuliyada lasoo dhaafay. Dhagax yada qaar, oo aan laga helin aduunkan, ayaa la gadaya in udhaxeyso US$11,000 ilaa $22,500 ounce-kiiba, taaso ah in kabadan toban jibaar qiimaha dahabka.
mt: 24,000 people have been evacuated from the area. 34 people have been killed. 15 people have been injured. 15 homes have been destroyed. The total damage is estimated at between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce of gold, which is about $10,000 per kilogram.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher oo howlgab noqday sanadka markuu aha 2006 ka bacdi marka uu ku guleystay Formula 1 ee todobo jeer, ayaa lagu waday inuu beddelo dhaawaca Felipe Massa dartiis. Baraasiiliga waxa kasoo gaaray dhaawac khatara oo dhanka madaxa ah shilkii Hungarian Grand Prix ee 2009 kii. Massa ayaa maqnaan doono ugu yaraan inta ka dhiman xiligan 2009.
mt: 2006 champion Michael Schumacher, who retired from Formula 1 after winning eight titles, was replaced by Felipe Massa, who was injured in a crash at the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa will miss at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Bam gaari lagu soo xiray ayaa ku qarxay xarunta booliiska ee Gaziantep, Turkey shalaytoole subaxnimadii wuxuuna dilay laba askari in ka badan labaatan qof oo kalena waa dhaawacay. Xafiiska gafanaha ayaa sheegay in sagaal iyo toban oo dhaabaca ka mid ay ahaayeen ciidamada booliska. Booliska ayaa sheegay inay uga shakisan yihiin qof mitid ah oo ka tirsan Daesb (ISIL) inuu weerarka ka masuul ahaa.
mt: 2 police vehicles collided in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing 2 police officers and injuring 23 others. The police department said that 10 of the injured were police officers. The police department said that the collision was caused by a terrorist attack by ISIL.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Maamulihii hore ee Massachusett ee Mitt Romney ayaa ku guulaystay tartarka doorashada madaxweynenimo ee xisbiga Republican Florida salaasadii wuxuuna helay 46 boqolkiiba codkii la dhiibtay. Afhayeenkii hore Aqalka New Gingrich ayaa kaalinta labaad ku soo galay 32 boqolkiiba. Guuleyste ahaan wuxuu lawareegaayaa gobalkoo dhan, Florida ayaa wada siisay kontonkeeda ergo Romney, iyadoo ku riixaysa inuu noqdo murashaxa hore ee xisbiga Jamhuuriga.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney won the Florida primary, taking 46 percent of the vote. Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. Romney's win gives him a commanding lead in the delegate count, as Florida's 50 delegates are awarded proportionally.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Af hayeenka hore barlamaanka Newt Gingrich, gafanaha Texas Rick Perry, iyoxubinta barlamaanka Michele Bachmann ayaa ku dhamaystiray kaalinta afaraad, shanaad, iyo lixaad. Ka dib markay natiijooyinka soo galeen, Gingrich ayaa u hambalyaayay Santorum lakin hadal adag ku dhahay Romney, oo isaga magaciisa xayaysiino olole xun logu samayay Iowa oo lola jeeday Gingrich. Perry waxa uu sheegay inuu “ ku noqon lahaa Texas si uu u eego natiijada isreebreeka ee caawa, una go’aansado bal inay dariiq u sii furan yahay”, balse dib uu ka sheegay inuu tartanka ku sii jirayo oo uu tartami doono tartanka koobaad ee South Carolina ka dhici doona Janaayo 21. Bachmann, taasoo ku guuleysatay Doorashadii Ames Straw ee Ogos, waxay  go’aansatay inay dhameyso ololaha.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and former Minnesota Congresswoman Michele Bachmann have all dropped out of the race. After the results were announced, Gingrich congratulated Santorum, but also congratulated Romney, who won the Iowa caucus. Perry said he would “take Texas back” and “go to South Carolina to win the primary there,” but later said he would not run in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, said she would drop out of the race.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Goobta laga maamulo websayt ka waxaa kagu qeexa barnaamijka “raadiyaha iskuulka hore ee tiyaatarka cusba hormarsanana ee la hormariyey!” Maalmihiisa ugu horeeyay, barnaajimka wuxuu gabi ahaanba ka baxay mareegta intarneetka mudada dheer jirtay ee TogiNet Radio, mareeg diiradda saarto raadiyo hadaleed. Gabagabada 2015, TogiNet ayaa u aasaasay AstroNet Radio inay ahaato shirkad ka hoos shaqeyso. Bandhiga waxa bilaawgi soo saaray cod duuba yaal cusub, oo deggan Bariga Texas.
mt: 2015, TogiNet launched AstroNet Radio, a company subsidiary. The station broadcasts from a new studio in the Dallas-Fort Worth area of Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Weerareyaasha Mumbai ayaa ku imaaday doon Nofeembar 26, 2008, iyagoo wataan bam gacmeed, hubka otomatik iyagoo weerarey dhawr meel ay ku jiraan xaruunra tareenka Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus iyo Hoteelka caanka Taj Mahal. Sahminta iyo war uruurinta David Headley ayaa kaalmeeyey hawlgalka 10ka nin hubeysan ee ka socday kooxda maleeshiyaha Bakistaan ka soo jeedo ee loo yaqaano Laskhar-e-Taiba. mt: 26 November 2008, a series of coordinated attacks by 10 men using explosives and guns took place in Mumbai, India. The attacks were planned by the Pakistani terrorist group Lashkar-e-Taiba, and were carried out by 10 Pakistani men, who were trained for the attacks in Pakistan and sailed in from Pakistan in two small boats. The attacks were coordinated by members of Lashkar-e-Taiba based in Pakistan, including David Headley, who was later convicted of conspiracy to commit terrorism in the United States. The attacks resulted in the deaths of 164 people, including 18 foreigners, and the wounding of over 300 people. The terrorists killed 6 police officers, 5 of whom were killed by a bomb planted in a police van. src: Diwaan galinta Madax madax ee Nadal iska hor imaadkii Kanadiyaanka ayaa ahayd 7-2. Waxa uu mardhow ka badiye Raonic ee Brisbane Open. Nadal waxa uu kulanka ka qaatay 88% dhibcaha oo xaasila taasoo guusha ku siisay 76 dhibcood qaybta hore. Ciyaarta ka dib, Boqor Kalaay wuxu yidhi “ waan ku faraxsanahay inaan ku soo laabtay wareegyadii u dambeeyay ee dhacdooyinka intooda badan. Waxaan isku dayayaa inaan tan ku guuleysto.”
mt: 7-2 was the score of the first set of the Canadian Nadal. Raonic won the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of the points and 76% of the first set points. In the second set, King said “I am happy to return to the court after so many injuries. I am ready to win.”
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Todobaadkii hore, Naked News waxay ku dhawaaqeen inay si wayn u kordhinayaa masuuliyadood luuqadaha qalaad ee warar gudbinta, kuna dari doonaan saddex baahineed oo cusub. Isagoo markii horeba warbixin ku soo gudbinayay Ingiriisi iyo Jabbaaniis, ayuu ururka caalamiga ah bilaabaya barnaamijyo ku baxaya luuqadaha Isbaanish, Talyaani, iyo Kuuriyaanka oo laga siin dayno taleefishinada, websaytyada iyo aalada moobilada.
mt: 2006, Naked News announced that it would be expanding its coverage to include three new languages: Spanish, Italian, and Japanese. The site had previously been available in English and Japanese, but the new languages were added to the site in 2007. The site also added a new feature called "Naked News TV," which allowed users to watch the news in real time.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Wixii ka danbeeya munasabada khamiista, Carpanedo wuxuu tartankii orodka ee ciyaaraha kaga adkaaday laba shakhsi. Teedii ugu horraysay waxay ahayd Slalom, halkaasoo ay ku heshay Did Not Finish lugtii horeba, 36 ka mid ah 116 kii tartame ayaa helay isku hal natiijo tartankaas. Tartankeedii kale, Slalom-tii Waynayd, waxay ku gaartay kaalinta tobnaad ee kooxda dumarka oo isku darka waqti orodkeedu uu ahaa 4:41.30, kaasoo 2:11.60 daqiiqo ka gaabinayay qofka koobaad, Claudia Loesch oo ree Usteeriya ah, 1:09.02 oo daqiiqo ka hooseysa qofka sagaalaad galay ee reer Hangari, Gyöngyi Dani. Afar kamida baraf-simbirixleyaasha doonyaha lugta oo kamid ahaa kooxda haweenka ayaa ku guuldaraystay inay dhamaystiraan orodkooda, 45 kamida 117 ka wadarka guud ee baraf-simbirixleyaasha ku sugnaa Giant Slalom ayaa ku guuldaraystay inay kaalin ka galaan tartarka.
mt: 36 of the 116 competitors finished the race. The first woman, Slalom, finished Did Not Finish. The second woman, Slalom of Norway, finished in 4:41.30, 2:11.60 faster than the second woman, Claudia Loesch of Austria, 1:09.02 faster than the third woman, Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four of the 117 women competitors finished the race. 45 of the 117 men competitors finished the race.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Arbacadii, Ururka Kubadda Koleyga ee Qaranka Maraynkanka (NBA) ayaa joojiyay xilli ciyaareedkoodii kubadda koleyga walaacyada COVID-19 daraadood. Go’aanka NBA ayaa ka dambeeyey ciyaartooy Utah Jazz oo baaritaanka lagu xaqiijiyay inuu qabo viruska COVID-19.
mt: 1 day ago, the National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its season due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The NBA postponed the Utah Jazz game after a player tested positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Ciyaartoyga Maalinta ee Maanta waa Alex Overchkin oo ka socda Washington Capitals. Waxa uu la yimi 2 gool iyo 2 caawineed ciyaartii Washington kaga guulaysatay5-3 Atlanta Thrashers. Caawintii ugu horeysay ee Overchkin ee habeenka waxay ahayd tii goolkii guusha ciyaarta keenay uu dhaliyay Nicklas Backsrtom; goolkiisa labaad ee habeenka ayaa ahaa midkiisa 60aad ee xiligaas, taasoo uu ku noqday ciyaaryahanka ugu horeeyo oo hal xili dhexdiisa ku xiro 60 gool ama ka badan ilaa 1995-96, markuu Jaromir Jagr iyo Mario Lemieux ay gaareen heerkaas.
mt: 2 goals and 2 assists, Alex Ovechkin scored the game-winning goal in the Washington Capitals' 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. His first goal of the game was assisted by Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the game was his 60th of the season, making him the youngest player to reach 60 goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux did it.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Bangiga Northern Rock Bank ayaa la qarameeyyay sanadkii 2008 kadib muujintiisa in shirkadu ay taageero degdeg ah ka heshay Dowlada Ingiriiska. Northern Rock waxa ay u baahatay caawinaad sababto ah markee ku lug lahaate dhibaatadii dhaqaale ee 2007. Mudane Richard Branson, Virgin Group-kiisa waxa ay codsi la diiday usoo direyn bangiga kahor inta aan bangiga la qarameyn. Sanadkii 2010, markii dawladda la wareegtay, bangiga hadda ee wadada qarkeeda ku yaalo Northern Rock plc ayaa laga gooyay ‘bangigii xumaa’, Northern Rock (Maamulka Hantida). Virgin waxay kaliya iibsatay ' bangiga wanaagsan’ ee Northern Rock , mana ahan shirkadda maareynta hantida.
mt: 2008, the bank was nationalized after a run on its deposits in 2007. Richard Branson, Virgin Group, was the first to offer to buy the bank before it was nationalized. In 2010, after the government took over, the bank was renamed Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin was the only bidder for the "good bank" Northern Rock, not the "bad bank" Northern Rock (Asset Management).
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Go'aanka Md. Rudd ee lagu ansixinayo heshiiska cimiladu wuxu gooni u saaraya Maraykanka, oo hadda noqon doonta waddanka keliya ee horumaray ee aan ansixin heshiiska. Dawladii hore konsarfatifka ahayd ee Ustareeliya ayaa diiday inay ansixiso Kyoto, iyadoo sheegtay inuu dhaawacayo dhaqaalaha maadaama ay si wayn ugu tiirsan tahay dhoofinta dhuxusha, iyadoo waddamada sida Hindiya iyo Shiinuhana aanay qabanayn xadadka wasakh sii daynta.
mt: 2005 Kyoto Protocol negotiations were stalled by the United Kingdom, who said it would hurt the economy and was too expensive, while countries such as India and China were not ready to sign the treaty.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Dableyda ilaalinta cayayaanka si dhaw ayaa waxa ula soconayo ilaaliyayaasha keynta, inta la indho indheynayo tijaabada lana ogaanayo qiimaha wax galgeeda. Wadashaqeynta NPWS iyo ururka difaaca Isboortiga ee Australiya (NSW) Inc, mutadawiciin xirfadleyaal ah ayaa laga shaqaaleysiiyay, barnaamijka ugaarsiga ururka difaaca isboortiga. Sida laga xigtay Mick O'Flynn, kusimaha Park Conservation iyo Heritage ee NPWS, afarta dabley ee loo doortay howl galka xabad ridida hore waxa ay heleen habraac amaana iyo tababar.
mt: 2 of the 4 firefighters were injured, one seriously. The NSW Park Conservation and Heritage team, including Mick O'Flynn, were called to the scene to assess the damage.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: """Iyada oo ku saleysan lafahii hore, taasi micnaheedu waa kala qeybsanaanta waa ay ka horeysaa sidii la filaayay caddeynta moodeelka. Taasi micneheedu waxay tahay wax walbo waa in dib loo celiyo,” ayuu dhahay cilmi baare ku sugan Adeega Cilmi Baaridda Rift Valley ee Ethiopia oo na ka ah qoraalaha labaad ee cilmi baaridda, Berhane Asfaw."
mt: """The first part of the report, which was released last week, was a preliminary assessment of the model. This part of the report is a more detailed analysis of the model, he said. This is a very important report," said Berhane Asfaw, a member of the Rift Valley Research Institute, Ethiopia, who is the lead author of the report, the second of two reports.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Wakhti hore wakaaladda wararka ee Jayna Xinhua ayaa soo warisay in dayuuradda la afduubay. Warar danbe ayaa sheegay in diyaarada loogu hanjabay qarax, dibna loogu weeciye Afghanistan, aydoo ku dagtay Kandahar. Warbixinada hore ayaa sheegaaya in diyaaradii dib logu celiyay Afghanistan ka dib markii loo diiday inay si degdeg ah ugu degto Ürümqi.
mt: 1. The Xinhua news agency reported that the plane was destroyed. 2. Later reports said the plane crashed, killing all on board, and was en route to Kandahar, Afghanistan. 3. Earlier reports said the plane was en route to Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: Isniintii, Sara danius xoghayaha joogtada ah ee guddiga Nobel ee akadeemiyada Iswiidishka, ayaa si cad u shaacisay Intii lagu guda jiray barnaamij ka raadiyaha idaacadda Sveriges ee Sweden in gudigu awoodi waayay inay si toos ah Bob Dylan ugala xiriiraan Ku Guulaysiga Billadda Noobalka ee Suugaanta 2016, oo ay iska daayeen inay tamar ku bixiyaan xiriirkaas. Danius wuxuu yidhi, “iminkadan waxba ma sameyneyno. Waxaan sameeyey wicitaano sidoo kale waxaan direy fariimo waxaan u direy dadka wada shaqeyno waxaana ka heley jawaabo aad u wanagsan. src: Madax waynaha Maraykanka George W. Bush ayaa soo dhaweeyey ku dhawaaqidda. Afhayen madaxweyne Bush Gordon Johndroe wuxuu ugu baaqay Waqoyiga Kuuriyo “ine cadeecan talaabooyinka waa weyn ee lagu garayo guulaha lagu xaqiijiyo joojinta isticmaalida nukliyeer ka dhulka Kuuriyo.”
mt: 2004 U.S. President George W. Bush has arrived to inspect the damage. White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the quake was a "terrible tragedy" and that the U.S. was ready to help the island nation.
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "1956dii Stania wuxuu u guuray Iswiidhan, halkaasi oo uu saddex sanno kadib uu shaqo ka bilaabay xafiiska boosaha ee Iswiidhan halkaasina uu ka noqday madaxa naqshadaynta. Wuxuu usoo saaray ilaa 1,000 calaamad boosto Sweden iyo 28 uu usoo saaray wadamo kale. Hawlaha uu qabtay waxa loo aqoonsan yahay tayo iyo tafaasiil heer sare ah waana ta ka dhigtay mid ka mid ah "" kuwa ugu caansan"" dadka kaadhadhka boostada uruuriya. Dadka qaarbaa ku takhasusay uruurinta hawlaha uu qabtay oo keliya. tiimbarihiisi 1000-naad waxa uu aha mid cajiiba ""Ficiladii Wanaagsana ee Booqaradi Iswedishka"" ee David Klocker Ehrenstrahl 2000, taaso lagu diwaan geliye buuga mucjisooyinka aduunka. Wuxuu sidoo kale ka shaqaynaayey u naqshadaynta lacagaha wadamo badan, tusaalooyinka ugu dambeeyey oo shaqadiisa ayaa ka mid ah sawiradda Raysul Wasaaraha ee ku yaalo horta lacagta cusub ee canada ee $5 iyo $100."
mt: 1956, Stania moved to Sweden, where he began working for the Swedish Customs Service, later becoming the head of the department. He examined over 1,000 Swedish customs declarations and 28 foreign ones. His work was considered to be of the highest quality and was one of the "most beautiful" customs declarations. Most people were impressed by his work. His 1000th declaration was named the "Swedish Customs Declaration of the Century" by David Klocker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, and was later included in the book "The Most Beautiful Customs Declarations in the World". He also designed the currency of many countries, the latest being the $5 and $100 Canadian bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Ilaa 800 oo mayl oo Nidaamka Dhuumaha Trans-Alaska ayaa la xiray ka dib markay daateen kumanaan oo taangi oo saliida aan la sifeynin au ka dhacday koonfurta Fairbanks, Alaska. Fashilan dhanka dabka ah oo ka dhalatay nidaamka caadiga ah ee tijaabada amarka-ridista ayaa ku hibaaqyada debcinta ku keenay inay furmaan saliidii qeedhinaydna waxay ku fatahday bamka isteeshinka 9 ee u dhow Fort Greely. Faalafyada furmay waxay sababeen cadaadis sii deyn dhanka nidaamka ah dabadeed saliid ayaa soo raacday tuubooyinka taangi hayn kara 55,000 barmiil (2.3 malyan oo galaan). Ilaa galabnimadii Arbacada, burmadaha taangigu weli way liidayeen waxaana laga yaaba inay taas keentay kulka ku fiday gudaha taangiga. Weel kale oo wax lagu kaydiyo oo ka hooseeya taangiyada qaadi kara 104,500 foost ayaa wali la buuxin.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline was shut down after a leak of up to 5,500 barrels of oil was discovered in the south of Fairbanks, Alaska. The leak was caused by a pipeline rupture at milepost 9 near Fort Greely. The leak caused a 55,000-barrel (2.3 million gallon) spill. By midnight on August 15, the leak had been contained and the oil had stopped flowing. A second leak, near milepost 104,500, was also discovered.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Midnimada Injineerada Maraykanka ayaa qiyaasay in ilaa 6 inji roob gaarayo inuu kharibi karo biyo haynta horaan wax gaaray. Degmada Ninth Ward ,taasoo la kulanatay fatahaad ilaa 20 cagood ah intii lagu jiray Duufaantii Katrina, ayaa hadda biyuhu u joogaan ilaa miskaha maadaama biyo fadhiisinka ku dhawaa fatahay. Biyaha ka soo dadanayo buurta qeybta dhirir keedu yahay 100 talaabo.
mt: 6 inches of rain is expected to fall in the next 24 hours. The Ninth Ward, which was flooded up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now flooded up to the roof. The levee is breached in several places.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton waxa lagu xaqiijiyey Jamacada Isbitaalka Howard ka dib markii la keeney bukaan xaladiisu iska degan tahay. Bukaanka wuxuu joogey Nigeria, taas xiliga laga heley xanuunka fayriska Ebola oo ku dhacay. Isbitaalku wuxuu raacay sharciga lagu maamulo infakshanka, iyadoo ay ku jirto kala saarida bukaanada kuwa kale lagaga hor tagayo suurta galnimada infakshanka kale.
mt: 2 days after the hospital was evacuated, it was reported that a patient with Ebola had been admitted. The hospital was closed for decontamination, and other patients were transferred to other hospitals.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Iyadoo maamulku aanu hubin run ahaanshaha jiritaanka khatarta, Maamulka Gaadiidka Maryland ayaa xirista dhaqangelista ka dib markii ay FBI ku boorisay sidaas. Iskarogooyin ayaa lagu gooyay iridda laga galo dhuunta waxaana diyaar ahaa 80 booliis taageero ah oo baabuurleyda ah ku hagayay meelahay ka weecanayaan. Ma jirin daahdaah socdaalka gawaarida ah oo lagu sheegay wadada wayn, oo ah wadada kale oo magaalada.
mt: 80 miles away, the Maryland Transportation Authority announced the closure of the Baltimore-Washington Parkway after the FBI said it had received a bomb threat. The road was closed in both directions, and the Maryland Transportation Authority said it was working with the FBI and the Maryland State Police to investigate the threat. The road was reopened at 1:30 p.m. after the FBI said the threat was not credible.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "Sawir Qaadaha Waxaa loo Qaaday Xarunta Caaafimaadka Ronald Reagan ee UCLA, halkaas oo uu Markii dambe ku dhintay. Sida la sheegay wuxu ku jiray 20yadiisii. Warbixin ayuu Bieber ku sheegay ""in kastoo aan joogin oo aanan si toos ahna faraba ugula jirin shilkan daran, waxaan tacsi iyo duco u dirayaa qoyska dulmanaha."" Boggaga internetka wararka madadaalada TMZ ayaa fahansan in sawiraaga uu baaburkiisa ku joojiyay dhanka kale ee Sepulveda Boulevard ka dib na isu dayay inuu sawiro isbaarada booliska intuu wadada goynin oo na sii socdo, taasi oo ku keentay in booliska California Highway Patrol oo isbaaraha joogay inuu ku amro inuu ku soo laabto isbaaraha, laba jeer. Marka loo eego bilayska, dirawalka baabuurka jiidhay sawir qaadahu waxaa suurta gal ah inaanu wajahin xukun danbiyeed."
mt: 20-year-old Bieber was found dead at the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center. Bieber had tweeted, "Even though I don't know you, and never will, I am truly sorry for your loss and hope that you find peace in knowing that he is no longer suffering, and that he is now dancing like no one is watching." Internet gossip site TMZ reported that Bieber was seen driving his car on Sepulveda Boulevard after leaving the scene of the accident, prompting the California Highway Patrol to issue a warning to Bieber to return to the scene. When police arrived, they found the car and Bieber's body. The coroner's office said Bieber died of a single gunshot wound to the head.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Arias ayaa laga helay nooc fudud oo virus-ka, Madax Weyne Rodrigo Arias ayaa sheegay. Xaalada madaxeynaha waa mid dagan, in kasto lagu karantilidoono guriga dhowr malmood. ""Marka laga tago xummad iyo cuno xanuun, waan fayo qabaa oo waan fiicnahay shaqadaydana qaab masaafeed baan u qabsan karaa. Waxaanu rajaynayaa inaanu hawshayda kusoo laabto Isniinta,” ayuu ku yiray Arias bayaan."
mt: 28-year-old Rodrigo Arias was diagnosed with a mild form of the virus. The mayor said that the family is quarantined in their home. "When I get better, I will go back to work on Monday," he said.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Markee ugu badneyd, duufanta Torobikalka ee Gonu, loogu magac daray boorsadii caleenta qunbe luuqadaha Maldives-ka, waxa ay gaarte 240 kiilomitir saacadii (149 meyl saacadii) Xili hore maanta, dabeelaha ayaa ku socdeen xoog 83 kilomiitar saacadii, iyadoo la filanaayo inay sii daciifto.
mt: 240 kilometers (149 miles) east of the Maldives, the storm was 83 kilometers (52 miles) wide and moving west at 20 kilometers (12 miles) per hour.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Hirarka gaduudan waxaa keena marka ay badan tahay Karenia brevis, arrin dabiiciya ee noole hal unugle oo badda ku nool. Qodobada dabeecadeed ayaa is dhexgalo kara si ay u soo saaraan xaalado aad u habboon, oo u ogolaanaya aljahan inuu tiro ahaan aad u kordho. Daxalku wuxu soo saaraa sun neerfeed shaqada ka joojisa neerfayaasha aadamaha iyo kalluunkaba. Kaluunka badan wuuw dhinta sababta oo ah uruurinta waxyaba sunta lagu daadiyo biyaha. Aadamaha waxay saameyn kara neefsashada biyo wasakhaysan oo hawada ay dabaylo iyo mawjado geliyeen.

ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Felicia, oo mar ahayd Duufaanka Heerka 4 ee Iskeelka Saffir-Simpson ahayd, ayaa hoos ugu soo dhacday duufaan yaraw kulaaleed ka hor intaanay meesha ka bixin Salaasadii. Hadhaageeda ayaa keenay roob dul ka hoor ah oo ka da’ay inta badan ee jasiiradda, in kastoo ilaa hadda, aan wax dhaawacyo ama daadad ah aan la soo werin. Roob, gaadhayay 6.34 inji markii la cabbiray oo Oahu ku hooray, ayaa lagu qeexay inuu ""faaiido"" leeyahay. Qaar ka mida roobka ayaa waxa la socday duufano iyo hilaacyo joogta."
mt: 4th Category Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Felicia passed over the island of Hawaii on Sunday. The storm brought heavy rains and flooding to the island, but no damage or injuries were reported. The storm, which was 6.34 inches deep when it hit Oahu, was said to be "beneficial." Some of the rain was said to be "hurricane force."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. wuxuu burburay 2008 magalada Singapore Grand Prix ka bacdi marki uu yara joojiyey Fernando Alonso, isago marka dibada u soo saray gaadhiga badbaadada. Gadhiga sida uu ugu socday Alonso wuxu gaadhay xeer uu shidaalka dhafay halki badbadinta gaadhiga, wuxuu isagana ugu dhaqaqay si uu qaato guusha. Piquet Jr. Ayaa shaqada laga saaray taratanka Hungarian Grand Prix dhacay 2009 ka dib.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix winner Piquet Jr. was passed by Fernando Alonso on the first lap, and then passed him on the second lap. The pass was controversial as it was made on the inside of a corner, and Piquet Jr. was given a 10-second penalty. He was disqualified from the race after the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Cilmi baadhis Khamiistii lagu daabacay joornaal Saynis ayaa sheegtay in nooc cusub oo shimbiro ah ku sameysmeen Jasiiradaha Ecuadorean Galápagos. Cilmi baadheyaasha ka yimaada jamacadda Princeton ee ku taala Maraykanka iyo Jamacadda Uppesala ee ku taala Iswiidhan ayaa soo wariyey noocyo cusub kuwaasi oo saamayn ku leh kaliya laba jiil, inkastoo nidaamkani la rumaysanyahay inuu qaadan karo wakhti dheer, sababtuna tahay isku tagga indeemig Darwin, Geospiza forctes, iyo dhirta qalaad kaktus,Geospiza konirosris.
mt: 2 new species of finch have been discovered on the Galápagos Islands. The Princeton University and Uppsala University researchers say the new species are only two of many that could be found on the islands, but that they are unlikely to be found in the near future, because of the difficulty of finding the elusive Darwin's finch, Geospiza forctes, and the cactus finch, Geospiza konirosris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Xaflada farshaxanku waxay qayb ka tahay ololaha Bucharest City Hall ku raadinayso inay dib u soo celiso sawirkii caasimasii Roomaaniyiinta ee ahaa magaalo xirfad iyo midabo badan. Magalada waxa ay noqon doonta midii koonfur bari Yurub ugu horeyse in ay qabato CowParade, bandhiga ugu weyn ee fanka, inta udhaxeysa June iyo August sanadkan.
mt: 1 of 2 statues in the city's CowParade, the largest public art event in the world, is on display in June and August.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Diyaaradu waxay u jihaysatay dhankaas Irkutsk waxaana ka shaqeeysiiyay ciidamo gudaha ka shaqeeya. Su’aalo ayaa la sameeyey si loo baaro. Il-76 wuxu qayb wayn ka ahaa milatariga Ruushka iyo Sofiyeetka labadaba ilaa iyo 1970-yadii, waxayna hore ugala kulmeen shil khatar dalka Ruushka bishii la soo dhaafay 7 dii octoobar mashiin ku kala soocan duulista, isagoon dhaawacmin, Ruushka ayaa dhulka si kooban dhulka u dhigay Il-76s kadib shilkaasi.
mt: 2 crew members were injured. The aircraft was a Russian and Soviet military transport aircraft until the late 1970s, when it was replaced by the An-12. Russia has been phasing out the Il-76 since October 2007, when the last one was retired from service, according to the Russian Defense Ministry.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Kahor intii aanu simpson Simon ka shaqaynin inuu qabto dhawr bandhig oo meelo kala duwan ah. Intii lagu jiray 1980-meyadi, waxa uu ka shaqeeye filimada sida Taxi, Cheers, iyo The Tracy Ullman Show. Sanadka 1989 wuxuu ka caawiyey sameynta Simpsons Brooks iyo Groening waxay masuul ka ahaayeen shaqaleysiinta qoraha barnaamijka ugu horeya kooxda. In kastoo uu ka tegay bandhiga 1993 haddana wuu sii haystay magaciisa ah soo saaraha guud, wuxuna sii waday inuu tobaan milyan oo doolar ku helo magaciisii.
mt: 1980s, he worked on Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989, he co-created the animated series The Simpsons with Matt Groening and James L. Brooks, for which he has since received two Primetime Emmy Awards. He has continued to write for the series, and has also directed episodes. He has also written and directed episodes of Futurama, and has made guest appearances in a number of television and film productions. He has also worked on the films Life of Brian, The Blues Brothers, and The Color Purple. He has also written and directed episodes of Futurama, and has made guest appearances in a number of television and film productions. He has also worked on the films Life of Brian, The Blues Brothers, and The Color Purple. He has also written and directed episodes of Futurama, and has made guest appearances in a number of television and film productions. He has also worked on the films Life of Brian, The Blues Brothers, and The Color Purple.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: """Wuxu u dhaqmi doonaa sida biyaha. Waa la iska dhex arki karaa sida biyaha. Markaas hadii aad taagnayd ceeliga xeebta, waxaad arki karaysay quruurux iyo wax kasta oo kale oo gunta yaallay. Sida aan ka war heyno, waxaa jiro keliya jir mere kaas oo muujinayo firfircooni badan oo kala duwan marka loo eego Titan, magaciisuna waa Dhul,” waxa yidhi Stophan."
mt: "It will be like the ocean. It will be a place where you can go to the beach, swim, and do all the other things you can do on Earth. There is no reason why it can't be a place where you can live and work and raise a family," said Stophan.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Tani kaiya maaha xaqiijimo ku saabsan in ugu yaraan woxogaa dinosaaris ah leeyihiin aaboyaal, waa fikradu hore u faaftay , lakiin waxay bixinaysaa macluumad aan caam ahayn, sida midabka iyo u haynta qaab 3D ah. Aqoonyahanada sayniska ayaa sheegaan in dufka xayawaankani uu kor ka ahaa midab kafe hoosna ka ahaa midib furan ama midib cas. Natiijada ayaa sidoo kale kordhinayso fahanka laga leeyahay isbedelada dabiiciga oo ku yimaaday baalasha shimbirta. Maadaama baalasha dhaynasooradu aanay lahayn dacallo si fiican u samaysan, ee loo yaqaan raajis, balse ay leeyihiin qaabab kale - baarbis iyo baarbaluus- cilmi baadhayaashu waxay sheegeen in raajiska laga yaabo inuu ahaa mid dib uga soo sameysmay qaababkaas hore. Qaab-dhismeedka baalashu waxay tusinayaan inaan loo adeegsan jirin duulimaadka balse maamulista heerkulka amase qurux. Cilmibaadhuhu wuxu soo jeedinayaa, in kastoo kani yahay dibka dhaynasoor yar, in muunadu tusinayso baalal shimbir wayn ee aan mid dhallaal ahayn. Cilmi baadhayaashu waxay soo jeediyeen, xitaa in kastoo kani uu yahay dibka dhaynasoor yar, muunadu waxay tusinaysaa baalasha mid wayn balse maaha mid caruureed.

ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Iyadoo hal talaal tijaabo ah uu u muuqdo in uu yarayn karo u dhimashada Ebola, illaa haatan, si cad looma soo bandhigin dawo ku habboon daaweynta caabuqyada jiray. Hal isku darka halka antibody, ZMapp, ayaa horaantii ka muuqday meesha, balse baadhis rasmiya ayaa soo saartay inuu ka faaiido yar yahay dhimasha ka hortaga laga rabay. Bilowgi PALM, ZMapp waxay u shaqeysay maamul ahaan, micnaheeduna waa saynis yahanadu waxay u isticmaalaan aas asas ahaan si la isu bar bar dhigo sadexda dhaqan ee kale.
mt: 2 days after the Ebola outbreak, the experimental drug ZMapp was administered to two American aid workers. The FDA has not yet approved the drug, but the company that manufactures it, Mapp Biopharmaceutical, has been working with the U.S. government to make it available to the public.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Maalinta Isniinta, saynis yahano ka socda Jamacada Stanford ee Iskuul Caafimadka waxay ku dhawaaqeen sameynta qalab daweyn cusub lagu habeyn karo unugyada : kuwa yar yar ee lagu soo saari karo muditan waxaana macquul ah in lagu soo saro Mareykan ka mid walba. Hogaamiyaasha cilmi barista waxay sheegen tani in ay hor seedi karto lagu ogaan karo xanuunka kansarka, xanuunka sanbabada HIV ga iyo bukaanada duumadawadama dhaqaalahooda hooseya, halkaas oo ay heerka samata baxa xanuunada sida kansarka ku dhaca nasaha taaso u dhigmeysa qeyb un marka loo barbar dhigo wadamada qaniga ah.
mt: 1st of July, the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the first successful trial of a new gene therapy for sickle cell disease, which can be passed on to children. The researchers said that the therapy could potentially cure the disease, which affects millions of people worldwide. The therapy involves removing blood-forming cells from the patient, genetically modifying them in the lab, and then returning them to the patient. The modified cells produce normal hemoglobin, which is the protein in red blood cells that carries oxygen. The researchers said that the therapy could potentially cure the disease, which affects millions of people worldwide. The therapy involves removing blood-forming cells from the patient, genetically modifying them in the lab, and then returning them to the patient. The modified cells produce normal hemoglobin, which is the protein in red blood cells that carries oxygen.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Saynisyahanadu waxay dayaxa oogadiisa ku arkeen qaab dhuleed ku daadsan kuwaasoo loo yaqaan haraayada loobayt kuwaaso sida muuqata ka dhashay dayaxa oo si tartiiba u soo yaraaday. Buraha dooga leh waxaa lagu arka dayaxa dushiis kuwaas oo ugu yaraan cimilo ahaan u muuqada, iyagoo muujinayo dhacdoyinka dhulku kuwas uu si taxadir u sameyey. Aragtidan waxay ka hor imanaysaasheegista in uu dayaxa uu gebi ahaan inuusan laheyn wax hoolo dhulka.
mt: 3D printers can create objects from scratch, but they can also be used to repair existing objects. The technology is already being used to make replacement parts for cars and airplanes, and to create prosthetic limbs for people in developing countries. The printers can also be used to make replacement parts for cars and airplanes, and to create prosthetic limbs for people in developing countries.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Adekoya ilaa hadda waxa Xafiiska Maxkamada Edinburgh ku soo eedaysay inay dishahy wiilkeedii Waxay ku jiri xabsi inta dacwad lagu soo oogayo iyo maxkamadeynteeda, laakiin cadeyn kasta oo goobjooge ah waa la hallayn karaa maxaa yeelay muuqaalkeeda si weyn ayaa loo baahiyay. Nidaamkan la isku raacsan yahay meelwalba UK lakin cadalada Scottish waxay u shaqeysa si ka duwan sidoo kale maxkamada waxay u eegan muqalada sawirada sameynta ay yeelan karaan mustaqbalka. Professor Pamela Ferguson ee ka socoto Jaamacadda Dundee ayaa sheegeysa “suxufiyiinta ayaa ku socdo wado halis ah haday daabacayaan sawiraanta tuhmanayaalka.” Xafiiska korown, kaasi oo ah meesha ka dhacdo go'aanka maxkadaynta,ayaa u muujiyay saxafiyiinta joornaalada in aanay jirin doonin waxdanbe oo ka go'naansho ah ugu yaraan tan iyo inta laga gaadhayo eedaynta.

She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Iyadoo loo egayo burburka barafka, xalada adage e cimilada taas oo sii adkaneysay dadaalada badbaadinta. Pittman waxa uu soo jeediyay inaanay xaaladuhu hagaagayn illaa iyo waqti kamid todobaadka soo socda maahane. Xaddiga iyo cufnaanta barafku, sida uu sheegay Pittman, heerkii ay ugu xummayd ayay ku maraysaa ugaadhsatada siilka 15 kii sannadood ee la soo dhaafay.
mt: 15 people were injured, including one critically, according to Pittman. The fire and cold, as Pittman said, are expected to affect the elderly and the homeless.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

mt: 15 people were injured, including one critically, according to Pittman. The fire and cold, as Pittman said, are expected to affect the elderly and the homeless.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "Robert sicad ayuu u diiday in uu ka hadlo marka uu aminsan yahay inay nolasha bilaabato, su'aal muhiim ah marka laga hadlayo anshaxa ilma ridka, asagoo leh waa anshax xumo in laga dhiibo ra'yi arimo ay malo ku jirto. Waxa uu, si kastaba ha ahaatee, ku celiyay odhaahdiisii hore ee sheegaysay in Roe v. Wade uu yahay "" Sharciga deggan ee dhulka"", isagoo carrabka ku adkaynaya muhiimadda ay leedahay xukumadda Maxkamadda Sare oo joogto ah. Waxa uu sidoo kale xaqiijiyay inuu aaminsan yahay xuquuqda la maldahay ee sirnimada taasoo go’aanka Roe ku tiirsanaa."
mt: "Robert sicad ayuu u diiday in uu ka hadlo marka uu aminsan yahay inay nolasha bilaabato, su'aal muhiim ah marka laga hadlayo anshaxa ilma ridka, asagoo leh waa anshax xumo in laga dhiibo ra'yi arimo ay malo ku jirto. Waxa uu, si kastaba ha ahaatee, ku celiyay odhaahdiisii hore ee sheegaysay in Roe v. Wade uu yahay "" Sharciga deggan ee dhulka"", isagoo carrabka ku adkaynaya muhiimadda ay leedahay xukumadda Maxkamadda Sare oo joogto ah. Waxa uu sidoo kale xaqiijiyay inuu aaminsan yahay xuquuqda la maldahay ee sirnimada taasoo go’aanka Roe ku tiirsanaa."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: 8:46 subaxnimo oo ku jaran ayay magaaladu shib tidhi, taaso muujinaysa isla xilliga dabayshii ugu horraysay haleeshay meesheedii. Labo koox iftiin leer ayaa kor loo taagay si aay hawada sare u qabtaan habeenki. Dhismaha ayaa u socdo shan dabaq oo cusub goobta, iyadoo xaruun gaadideed iyo beer xusuus dhexda ku taalo.
mt: 8:46 am local time, the city was rocked by the first explosion, followed by two blasts. Two fire trucks were dispatched to the scene. The building was damaged in three places, with a crater and a hole in the roof.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "Dhamaan meelaha laga galaayo godadka, oo ay ku qornaayeen “Todobada Walaalo”, ayaa ugu yaraan ah 100 ila 250 mitar (328 ilaa 820 talaabo) wareega. Muuqaalada iftiinka leh waxay ku tusayaan kala duwanaanshaha heerkulka laga bilaabo habeen iyo maalin waxayna ku tusinayaan inay yelankaran godad. ""Jawigu wuxuu said u qabowyahay maalinkii ruumadne habeenkii. ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Ninku sida la sheegayo waxa uu gaari saddex lugaley ah oo laga soo buuxiyay waxyaalaha qarxa soo dhex dhigay dad isu yimi. Ninka laga shakisanahay inuu qaraxa ka dambeeyey ayaa la xiray, ka dib markuu dhaabac kasoo gaaray qaraxa. Maamuladu magaciisa ma yaqaaniin ilaa hadda, in kastoo ay og yihiin inuu xubin ka yahay qawmiyadda Uighur.
mt: 3 people were injured in the crash, one of whom was the pilot. The pilot was taken to hospital, but died shortly after. His identity is unknown, but he is believed to be of Uighur descent.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
